00152 BOOLEAN DoorAtGridNo( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00153 {
00154       STRUCTURE *pStruct;
00155       pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructureHead;
00156       while( pStruct )
00157       {
00158             if( pStruct->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR )
00159                   return TRUE;
00160             pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
00161       }
00162       return FALSE;
00163 }
00164 
00165 BOOLEAN OpenableAtGridNo( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00166 {
00167       STRUCTURE *pStruct;
00168       pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructureHead;
00169       while( pStruct )
00170       {
00171             if( pStruct->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPENABLE )
00172                   return TRUE;
00173             pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
00174       }
00175       return FALSE;
00176 }
00177 
00178 BOOLEAN FloorAtGridNo( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00179 {
00180       LEVELNODE   *pLand;
00181       UINT32 uiTileType;
00182       pLand = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead;
00183       // Look through all objects and Search for type
00184       while( pLand )
00185       {
00186             if ( pLand->usIndex != NO_TILE )
00187             {
00188                   GetTileType( pLand->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00189                   if ( uiTileType >= FIRSTFLOOR && uiTileType <= LASTFLOOR )
00190                   {
00191                         return TRUE;
00192                   }
00193                   pLand = pLand->pNext;
00194             }
00195       }
00196       return FALSE;
00197 }
00198 
00199 BOOLEAN GridNoIndoors( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00200 {
00201       if( gfBasement || gfCaves )
00202             return TRUE;
00203       if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00204             return TRUE;
00205       return FALSE;
00206 }

00208 void DOIT( )
00209 {
00210 //    LEVELNODE *             pLand;
00211       //LEVELNODE *                 pObject;
00212       LEVELNODE   *                 pStruct, *pNewStruct;
00213       //LEVELNODE *                 pShadow;
00214       UINT32 uiLoop;
00215 
00216       // first level
00217       for( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < WORLD_MAX; uiLoop++ )
00218       {
00219             pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ uiLoop ].pStructHead;
00220 
00221             while ( pStruct != NULL )
00222             {
00223                   pNewStruct = pStruct->pNext;
00224 
00225                   if ( pStruct->usIndex >= DEBRISWOOD1 && pStruct->usIndex <= DEBRISWEEDS10 )
00226                   {
00227                          AddObjectToHead( uiLoop, pStruct->usIndex );
00228 
00229                          RemoveStruct( uiLoop, pStruct->usIndex );
00230                   }
00231 
00232                   pStruct = pNewStruct;
00233             }
00234 
00235 
00236       }
00237 
00238 }

00242 BOOLEAN InitializeWorld( )
00243 {
00244 
00245       gTileDatabaseSize = 0;
00246       gSurfaceMemUsage = 0;
00247       giCurrentTilesetID = -1;
00248 
00249       // DB Adds the _8 to the names if we're in 8 bit mode. 
00250       //ProcessTilesetNamesForBPP();
00251 
00252       // Memset tileset list
00253       memset( TileSurfaceFilenames, '\0', sizeof( TileSurfaceFilenames ) );
00254 
00255       // ATE: MEMSET LOG HEIGHT VALUES
00256       memset( gTileTypeLogicalHeight, 1, sizeof( gTileTypeLogicalHeight ) );
00257 
00258       // Memset tile database
00259       memset( gTileDatabase, 0, sizeof( gTileDatabase ) );
00260 
00261       // Init surface list
00262       memset( gTileSurfaceArray, 0, sizeof( gTileSurfaceArray ) );
00263 
00264       // Init default surface list
00265       memset( gbDefaultSurfaceUsed, 0, sizeof( gbDefaultSurfaceUsed ) );
00266 
00267       // Init same surface list
00268       memset( gbSameAsDefaultSurfaceUsed, 0, sizeof( gbSameAsDefaultSurfaceUsed ) );
00269 
00270 
00271       // Initialize world data
00272 
00273       gpWorldLevelData = (MAP_ELEMENT *)MemAlloc( WORLD_MAX * sizeof( MAP_ELEMENT ) );
00274       CHECKF( gpWorldLevelData );
00275 
00276       // Zero world
00277       memset( gpWorldLevelData, 0, WORLD_MAX * sizeof( MAP_ELEMENT ) );
00278 
00279       // Init room database
00280       InitRoomDatabase( );
00281 
00282       // INit tilesets
00283       InitEngineTilesets( );
00284 
00285 
00286 
00287       return( TRUE );
00288 
00289 }

00292 void DeinitializeWorld( )
00293 {
00294       TrashWorld();
00295 
00296       if ( gpWorldLevelData != NULL )
00297       {
00298             MemFree( gpWorldLevelData );
00299       }
00300

00302       {
00303             MemFree( gpDirtyData );
00304       }
00305 
00306       DestroyTileSurfaces( );
00307       FreeAllStructureFiles( );
00308 
00309       // Shutdown tile database data
00310       DeallocateTileDatabase( );
00311 
00312       ShutdownRoomDatabase( );
00313 }

00322 BOOLEAN LoadTileSurfaces( char ppTileSurfaceFilenames[][32], UINT8 ubTilesetID )
00323 {
00324   SGPFILENAME                 cTemp;
00325       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00326 
00327       UINT32                              uiPercentage;
00328       //UINT32                            uiLength;
00329       //UINT16                            uiFillColor;
00330       STRING512                     ExeDir;
00331       STRING512                     INIFile;
00332 
00333       // Get Executable Directory
00334       GetExecutableDirectory( ExeDir );
00335 
00336       // Adjust Current Dir
00337       // CHECK IF DEFAULT INI OVERRIDE FILE EXISTS
00338       sprintf( INIFile, "%s\\engine.ini", ExeDir );
00339       if ( !FileExists( INIFile )   )
00340       {
00341             // USE PER TILESET BASIS
00342             sprintf( INIFile, "%s\\engine%d.ini", ExeDir, ubTilesetID );
00343       }
00344 
00345       // If no Tileset filenames are given, return error
00346       if (ppTileSurfaceFilenames == NULL)
00347       {
00348             return( FALSE );
00349       }
00350       else
00351       {
00352         for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00353                   strcpy( TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], ppTileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop] );//(char *)(ppTileSurfaceFilenames + (65 * uiLoop)) );
00354       }
00355 
00356 
00357       //uiFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(223, 223, 223));
00358       //StartFrameBufferRender( );
00359       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 20, 399, 622, 420, uiFillColor );
00360       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 21, 400, 621, 419, 0 );
00361       //EndFrameBufferRender( );
00362 
00363       //uiFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB( 100, 0, 0 ));
00364       // load the tile surfaces
00365       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 1, 35, L"Tile Surfaces" );
00366   for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00367       {
00368 
00369             uiPercentage = (uiLoop * 100) / (NUMBEROFTILETYPES-1);
00370             RenderProgressBar( 0, uiPercentage );
00371 
00372             //uiFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB( 100 + uiPercentage , 0, 0 ));
00373             //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 22, 401, 22 + uiLength, 418, uiFillColor );
00374             //InvalidateRegion( 0, 399, 640, 420 );
00375             //EndFrameBufferRender( );
00376 
00377             // The cost of having to do this check each time through the loop,
00378             // thus about 20 times, seems better than having to maintain two
00379             // almost completely identical functions
00380             if (ppTileSurfaceFilenames == NULL)
00381             {
00382                   GetPrivateProfileString( "TileSurface Filenames", gTileSurfaceName[uiLoop], "", cTemp, SGPFILENAME_LEN, INIFile );
00383                   if (*cTemp != '\0')
00384                   {
00385                         strcpy( TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], cTemp );
00386                         if (AddTileSurface( cTemp, uiLoop, ubTilesetID, TRUE ) == FALSE)
00387                         {
00388                               DestroyTileSurfaces( );
00389                               return( FALSE );
00390                         }
00391                   }
00392                   else
00393                   {
00394                         // Use default
00395                         if (AddTileSurface( TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], uiLoop, ubTilesetID, FALSE ) == FALSE)
00396                         {
00397                               DestroyTileSurfaces(  );
00398                               return( FALSE );
00399                         }
00400 
00401                   }
00402 
00403             }
00404             else
00405             {
00406                   GetPrivateProfileString( "TileSurface Filenames", gTileSurfaceName[uiLoop], "", cTemp, SGPFILENAME_LEN, INIFile );
00407                   if (*cTemp != '\0')
00408                   {
00409                         strcpy( TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], cTemp );
00410                         if (AddTileSurface( cTemp, uiLoop, ubTilesetID, TRUE ) == FALSE)
00411                         {
00412                               DestroyTileSurfaces(  );
00413                               return( FALSE );
00414                         }
00415                   }
00416                   else
00417                   {
00418                         if (*(ppTileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop]) != '\0')
00419                         {
00420                               if (AddTileSurface( ppTileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], uiLoop, ubTilesetID, FALSE ) == FALSE)
00421                               {
00422                                     DestroyTileSurfaces( );
00423                                     return( FALSE );
00424                               }
00425                         }
00426                         else
00427                         {
00428                               // USE FIRST TILESET VALUE!
00429 
00430                               // ATE: If here, don't load default surface if already loaded...
00431                               if ( !gbDefaultSurfaceUsed[ uiLoop ] )
00432                               {
00433                                     strcpy( TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], gTilesets[ TLS_GENERIC_1 ].TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop] );//(char *)(ppTileSurfaceFilenames + (65 * uiLoop)) );
00434                                     if (AddTileSurface( gTilesets[ TLS_GENERIC_1 ].TileSurfaceFilenames[uiLoop], uiLoop, TLS_GENERIC_1, FALSE ) == FALSE)
00435                                     {
00436                                           DestroyTileSurfaces(  );
00437                                           return( FALSE );
00438                                     }
00439                               }
00440                               else
00441                               {     
00442                                     gbSameAsDefaultSurfaceUsed[ uiLoop ] = TRUE;
00443                               }
00444                         }
00445                   }
00446             }
00447       }
00448 
00449       return( TRUE );
00450 }
00451 
00452 BOOLEAN AddTileSurface( char * cFilename, UINT32 ubType, UINT8 ubTilesetID, BOOLEAN fGetFromRoot )
00453 {
00454       // Add tile surface
00455       PTILE_IMAGERY  TileSurf;      
00456       CHAR8 cFileBPP[128];
00457       CHAR8 cAdjustedFile[ 128 ];
00458 
00459       // Delete the surface first!
00460       if ( gTileSurfaceArray[ ubType ] != NULL )
00461       {
00462             DeleteTileSurface( gTileSurfaceArray[ ubType ] );
00463             gTileSurfaceArray[ ubType ] = NULL;
00464       }
00465 
00466       // Adjust flag for same as default used...
00467       gbSameAsDefaultSurfaceUsed[ ubType ] = FALSE;
00468 
00469       // Adjust for BPP
00470       FilenameForBPP(cFilename, cFileBPP);
00471 
00472       if ( !fGetFromRoot )
00473       {
00474             // Adjust for tileset position
00475             sprintf( cAdjustedFile, "TILESETS\\%d\\%s", ubTilesetID, cFileBPP );    
00476       }
00477       else
00478       {
00479             sprintf( cAdjustedFile, "%s", cFileBPP ); 
00480       }
00481 
00482       TileSurf = LoadTileSurface( cAdjustedFile );
00483 
00484       if ( TileSurf == NULL )
00485             return( FALSE );
00486 
00487       TileSurf->fType                                       = ubType;
00488 
00489       SetRaisedObjectFlag( cAdjustedFile, TileSurf );
00490 
00491       gTileSurfaceArray[ ubType ] = TileSurf;
00492 
00493       // OK, if we were not the default tileset, set value indicating that!
00494       if ( ubTilesetID != TLS_GENERIC_1 )
00495       {
00496             gbDefaultSurfaceUsed[ ubType ] = FALSE;
00497       }
00498       else
00499       {
00500             gbDefaultSurfaceUsed[ ubType ] = TRUE;
00501       }
00502 
00503       gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded[ ubType ] = TRUE;
00504 
00505   return( TRUE );
00506 }
00507 
00508 extern BOOLEAN gfLoadShadeTablesFromTextFile;
00509 
00510 void BuildTileShadeTables(  )
00511 {
00512       HWFILE                        hfile;
00513       STRING512               DataDir;
00514       STRING512               ShadeTableDir;
00515       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00516       CHAR8             cRootFile[ 128 ];
00517   BOOLEAN       fForceRebuildForSlot = FALSE;
00518 
00519 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00520       UINT32                        uiStartTime;
00521 #endif
00522       static UINT8 ubLastRed = 255, ubLastGreen = 255, ubLastBlue = 255;
00523 
00524       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00525             uiNumTablesLoaded = 0;
00526             uiNumTablesSaved = 0;
00527             uiNumImagesReloaded = 0;
00528             uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
00529       #endif
00530 
00531 
00532       //Set the directory to the shadetable directory
00533       GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
00534       sprintf( ShadeTableDir, "%s\\ShadeTables", DataDir );
00535       if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( ShadeTableDir ) )
00536       {
00537             AssertMsg( 0, "Can't set the directory to Data\\ShadeTable.  Kris' big problem!" );
00538       }
00539       hfile = FileOpen( "IgnoreShadeTables.txt",      FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00540       if( hfile )
00541       {
00542             FileClose( hfile );
00543             gfForceBuildShadeTables = TRUE;
00544       }
00545       else
00546       {
00547             gfForceBuildShadeTables = FALSE;
00548       }
00549       //now, determine if we are using specialized colors.
00550       if( gpLightColors[0].peRed || gpLightColors[0].peGreen ||   gpLightColors[0].peBlue )
00551       { //we are, which basically means we force build the shadetables.  However, the one
00552             //exception is if we are loading another map and the colors are the same.
00553             if( gpLightColors[0].peRed != ubLastRed || 
00554                         gpLightColors[0].peGreen != ubLastGreen ||
00555                         gpLightColors[0].peBlue != ubLastBlue )
00556             {     //Same tileset, but colors are different, so set things up to regenerate the shadetables.
00557                   gfForceBuildShadeTables = TRUE;
00558             }
00559             else
00560             { //same colors, same tileset, so don't rebuild shadetables -- much faster!
00561                   gfForceBuildShadeTables = FALSE;
00562             }
00563       }
00564 
00565       if( gfLoadShadeTablesFromTextFile )
00566       { //Because we're tweaking the RGB values in the text file, always force rebuild the shadetables
00567             //so that the user can tweak them in the same exe session.
00568             memset( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded, 1, sizeof( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded ) );
00569       }
00570 
00571       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00572       {
00573             if ( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] != NULL )
00574             {
00575                   // Don't Create shade tables if default were already used once!
00576                   #ifdef JA2EDITOR
00577                         if( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded[ uiLoop ] || gfEditorForceShadeTableRebuild )
00578                   #else
00579                         if( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded[ uiLoop ]  )
00580       #endif
00581                         {
00582           fForceRebuildForSlot = FALSE;
00583 
00584                   GetRootName( (INT8 *)cRootFile, (INT8 *)TileSurfaceFilenames[ uiLoop ] );
00585 
00586           if ( strcmp( cRootFile, "grass2" ) == 0 )
00587           {
00588             fForceRebuildForSlot = TRUE;
00589           }
00590 
00591                               #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00592                                     uiNumImagesReloaded++;
00593                               #endif
00594                               RenderProgressBar( 0, uiLoop * 100 / NUMBEROFTILETYPES );
00595                               CreateTilePaletteTables( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ]->vo, uiLoop, fForceRebuildForSlot );
00596         }
00597             }
00598       }
00599 
00600       //Restore the data directory once we are finished.
00601       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
00602 
00603       ubLastRed = gpLightColors[0].peRed;
00604       ubLastGreen = gpLightColors[0].peGreen;
00605       ubLastBlue = gpLightColors[0].peBlue;
00606 
00607       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00608             uiBuildShadeTableTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiStartTime;
00609       #endif
00610 }
00611 
00612 void DestroyTileShadeTables( )
00613 {
00614       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00615 
00616       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00617       {
00618             if ( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] != NULL )
00619             {
00620                   // Don't Delete shade tables if default are still being used...
00621                   #ifdef JA2EDITOR
00622                         if( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded[ uiLoop ] || gfEditorForceShadeTableRebuild )
00623                         {
00624                               DestroyObjectPaletteTables( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ]->vo );
00625                         }
00626                   #else
00627                         if( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded[ uiLoop ] )
00628                         {
00629                               DestroyObjectPaletteTables( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ]->vo );
00630                         }
00631                   #endif
00632             }
00633       }
00634 }
00635 
00636 void DestroyTileSurfaces( )
00637 {
00638       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00639 
00640       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; uiLoop++)
00641       {
00642             if ( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] != NULL )
00643             {
00644                   DeleteTileSurface( gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] );
00645                   gTileSurfaceArray[ uiLoop ] = NULL;
00646             }
00647       }
00648 }
00649 
00650 void CompileWorldTerrainIDs( void )
00651 {
00652       INT16                               sGridNo;
00653       INT16                               sTempGridNo;
00654       LEVELNODE   *                 pNode;
00655       TILE_ELEMENT *    pTileElement;
00656       UINT8                               ubLoop;
00657 
00658       for( sGridNo = 0; sGridNo < WORLD_MAX; sGridNo++ )
00659       {
00660             if (GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ))
00661             {
00662                   // Check if we have anything in object layer which has a terrain modifier
00663                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pObjectHead;
00664 
00665                   // ATE: CRAPOLA! Special case stuff here for the friggen pool since art was fu*ked up
00666                   if ( giCurrentTilesetID == TLS_BALIME_MUSEUM )
00667                   {
00668                         // Get ID
00669                         if ( pNode != NULL )
00670                         {
00671                               if ( pNode->usIndex == ANOTHERDEBRIS4 || pNode->usIndex == ANOTHERDEBRIS6 ||pNode->usIndex == ANOTHERDEBRIS7 )
00672                               {
00673                                     gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID = LOW_WATER;
00674                                     continue;
00675                               }
00676                         }
00677                   }
00678 
00679                   if (pNode == NULL || pNode->usIndex >= NUMBEROFTILES || gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].ubTerrainID == NO_TERRAIN)
00680                   {     // Try terrain instead!
00681                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pLandHead;
00682                   }
00683                   pTileElement = &(gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ]);
00684                   if (pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles > 1)
00685                   {
00686                         for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++)
00687                         {
00688                               sTempGridNo = sGridNo + pTileElement->pTileLocData[ubLoop].bTileOffsetX + pTileElement->pTileLocData[ubLoop].bTileOffsetY * WORLD_COLS;
00689                               gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].ubTerrainID = pTileElement->ubTerrainID;
00690                         }
00691                   }
00692                   else
00693                   {
00694                         gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID = pTileElement->ubTerrainID;
00695                   }
00696             }
00697       }
00698 }
00699 
00700 void CompileTileMovementCosts( UINT16 usGridNo )
00701 {
00702       UINT8                               ubTerrainID;
00703       TILE_ELEMENT            TileElem;
00704       LEVELNODE *             pLand;
00705 
00706       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
00707       BOOLEAN                             fStructuresOnRoof;
00708 
00709       UINT8             ubDirLoop;
00710 
00711 /*
00712 */
00713 
00714       if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( usGridNo ) )
00715       {
00716             // check for land of a different height in adjacent locations
00717             for ( ubDirLoop = 0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++ )     
00718             {
00719                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].sHeight !=
00720                                gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo + DirectionInc( ubDirLoop ) ].sHeight )
00721                   {
00722                         SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00723                   }
00724             }
00725 
00726             // check for exit grids
00727             if ( ExitGridAtGridNo( usGridNo ) )
00728             {
00729                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
00730                   {
00731                         SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_EXITGRID );
00732                   }
00733                   // leave the roof alone, and continue, so that we can get values for the roof if traversable
00734             }
00735 
00736       }
00737       else
00738       {
00739             for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
00740             {
00741                   SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  0, TRAVELCOST_OFF_MAP );
00742                   SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_OFF_MAP );
00743             }
00744             if (gpWorldLevelData[usGridNo].pStructureHead == NULL)
00745             {
00746                   return;
00747             }
00748       }
00749 
00750       if (gpWorldLevelData[usGridNo].pStructureHead != NULL)
00751       { // structures in tile
00752             // consider the land
00753             pLand = gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].pLandHead;
00754             if ( pLand != NULL )
00755             {
00756                   // Set TEMPORARY cost here
00757                   // Get from tile database
00758                   TileElem = gTileDatabase[ pLand->usIndex ];
00759 
00760                   // Get terrain type
00761                   ubTerrainID =     gpWorldLevelData[usGridNo].ubTerrainID; // = GetTerrainType( (INT16)usGridNo );
00762 
00763                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDirLoop++)
00764                   {
00765                         SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, gTileTypeMovementCost[ ubTerrainID ] );
00766                   }           
00767             }
00768 
00769             // now consider all structures
00770             pStructure = gpWorldLevelData[usGridNo].pStructureHead;
00771             fStructuresOnRoof = FALSE;
00772             do
00773             {
00774                   if (pStructure->sCubeOffset == STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND)
00775                   {
00776                         if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE)
00777                         {
00778                               if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WIREFENCE && pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN)
00779                               {
00780                                     // prevent movement along the fence but allow in all other directions
00781                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00782                                     {
00783                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00784                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00785                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00786                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00787                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( EAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00788                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00789                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTH, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00790                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00791                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00792                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00793                                                 break;
00794 
00795                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00796                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00797                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00798                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00799                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( EAST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00800                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00801                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTH, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00802                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00803                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00804                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_NOT_STANDING );
00805                                                 break;
00806                                     }
00807                               }
00808                               // all other passable structures do not block movement in any way
00809                         }
00810                         else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES)
00811                         {
00812                               if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_FENCE) && !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SPECIAL) )
00813                               {
00814                                     // jumpable!
00815                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00816                                     {
00817                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00818                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00819                                                 // can be jumped north and south
00820                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00821                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00822                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( EAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00823                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00824                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTH, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00825                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00826                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00827                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00828                                                 // set values for the tiles EXITED from this location
00829                                                 FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS, NORTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_NONE );
00830                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00831                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00832                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00833                                                 FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_NONE );
00834                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00835                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - 1, WEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00836                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00837                                                 break;
00838 
00839                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00840                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00841                                                 // can be jumped east and west
00842                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00843                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00844                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( EAST, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00845                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00846                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTH, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00847                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00848                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00849                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00850                                                 // set values for the tiles EXITED from this location
00851                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS, NORTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00852                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00853                                                 // make sure no obstacle costs exists before changing path cost to 0
00854                                                 if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ usGridNo + 1 ][ EAST ][ 0 ] < TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
00855                                                 {
00856                                                       FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_NONE );
00857                                                 }
00858                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00859                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00860                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00861                                                 if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ usGridNo - 1 ][ WEST ][ 0 ] < TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
00862                                                 {
00863                                                       FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - 1, WEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_NONE );
00864                                                 }
00865                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS - 1, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
00866                                                 break;
00867 
00868                                           default:
00869                                                 // corners aren't jumpable
00870                                                 for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDirLoop++)
00871                                                 {
00872                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );     
00873                                                 }
00874                                                 break;
00875                                     }
00876                               }
00877                               else if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_SANDBAG && StructureHeight( pStructure ) < 2 )
00878                               {
00879                                     for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDirLoop++)
00880                                     {
00881                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );     
00882                                     }
00883 
00884                                     if ( FindStructure( (UINT16) (usGridNo - WORLD_COLS), STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE ) == FALSE && FindStructure( (UINT16)(usGridNo + WORLD_COLS), STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE ) == FALSE )
00885                                     {
00886                                           FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, NORTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00887                                           FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00888                                     }
00889 
00890                                     if ( FindStructure( (UINT16)(usGridNo - 1), STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE ) == FALSE && FindStructure( (UINT16)(usGridNo + 1), STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE ) == FALSE )
00891                                     {
00892                                           FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00893                                           FORCE_SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, WEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_FENCE );
00894                                     }
00895                               }
00896                               else if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CAVEWALL ) )
00897           {
00898                                     for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDirLoop++)
00899                                     {
00900                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_CAVEWALL );     
00901                                     }
00902           }
00903                               else
00904                               {
00905                                     for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubDirLoop++)
00906                                     {
00907                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( ubDirLoop, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );     
00908                                     }
00909                               }
00910                         }
00911                         else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR) /*&& (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN))*/
00912                         { // NB closed doors are treated just like walls, in the section after this
00913 
00914                               if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DDOOR_LEFT && (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT) )
00915                               {
00916                                     // double door, left side (as you look on the screen)
00917                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00918                                     {
00919                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00920                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
00921                                                 { // doorpost
00922                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00923                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
00924                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00925                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00926                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W );
00927                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00928                                                       // corner
00929                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1 + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00930                                                 }
00931                                                 else
00932                                                 {     // door
00933                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W );
00934                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W );
00935                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW );
00936                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW );
00937                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W_W );
00938                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_W );
00939                                                 }
00940                                                 break;
00941 
00942                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00943                                                 // doorpost
00944                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00945                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1,NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00946                                                 // door
00947                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE );
00948                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE );
00949                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N );
00950                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N );
00951                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - 1, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_E );
00952                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NE );
00953                                                 break;
00954 
00955                                           default:
00956                                                 // door with no orientation specified!?
00957                                                 break;
00958                                     }
00959                               }
00960                               else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DDOOR_RIGHT && (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT) )
00961                               {
00962                                     // double door, right side (as you look on the screen)
00963                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00964                                     {
00965                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00966                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
00967                                                 {     // doorpost
00968                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00969                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
00970                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00971                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00972                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N )
00973                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );                                                     ;
00974                                                       // corner
00975                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1 ,NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00976                                                 }
00977                                                 else
00978                                                 { // door
00979                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N );
00980                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N );
00981                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW );
00982                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW );
00983                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_N_N );
00984                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_NW_N );
00985                                                 }
00986                                                 break;
00987 
00988                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00989                                                 // doorpost
00990                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00991                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00992                                                 // corner
00993                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1 ,NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
00994                                                 // door
00995                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE );
00996                                                 SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_HERE );
00997                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W );
00998                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_W );
00999                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_S );
01000                                                 SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_OPEN_SW );
01001                                                 break;
01002                                           default:
01003                                                 // door with no orientation specified!?
01004                                                 break;
01005                                     }
01006                               }
01007                               else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLIDINGDOOR && pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles > 1)
01008                               {
01009                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
01010                                     {
01011                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01012                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01013                                                 // doorframe post in one corner of each of the tiles
01014                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
01015                                                 {                                               
01016                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01017                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01018                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01019                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01020                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N );
01021                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N );
01022 
01023                                                 }
01024                                                 else
01025                                                 {
01026                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01027                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01028                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01029                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N);
01030                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N);
01031                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01032 
01033                                                 }
01034                                                 break;
01035                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01036                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01037                                                 // doorframe post in one corner of each of the tiles
01038                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
01039                                                 { 
01040                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01041                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01042                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01043 
01044                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01045                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W );
01046                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W );
01047                                                 }
01048                                                 else
01049                                                 {
01050                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01051                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );
01052                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01053 
01054                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W );
01055                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_W );
01056                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01057                                                 }
01058                                                 break;
01059                                     }
01060                               }
01061                               else
01062                               {
01063                                     // standard door
01064                                     switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
01065                                     {
01066                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01067                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
01068                                                 {     // doorframe
01069                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01070                                                       SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTH, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_HERE );

01074                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTH, 0, TRAVELCOST_DOOR_CLOSED_N );
01075                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01076 
01077                                                       // DO CORNERS
01078                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - 1, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01079                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01080                                                       SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );

01087                                                       //SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
01088                                                       // corner
01089                                                       //SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1 ,NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
01090                                                 }

01092                                                 { // door

01119                                                 //SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );

01124                                                 // door
01125                                                 if (!(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLIDINGDOOR))

01205                                                 break;
01206 
01207                                           default:

01209                                                 break;
01210                                     }
01211                               }
01212 
01213                               /*

01255

01257                         }
01258                         else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF )
01259                         {
01260                               //ATE: IF a closed door, set to door value
01261                               switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
01262                               {
01263                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01264                                     case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01265                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHEAST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );

01271

01274                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01275                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS - 1, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01276                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01277                                           break;
01278 
01279                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01280                                     case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01281                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( SOUTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01282                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( WEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01283                                           SET_CURRMOVEMENTCOST( NORTHWEST, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01284                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01285                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, EAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );                                           
01286                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01287 
01288                                           // DO CORNERS
01289                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS + 1, NORTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01290                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo - WORLD_COLS, NORTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01291                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS + 1, SOUTHEAST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01292                                           SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo + WORLD_COLS, SOUTHWEST, 0, TRAVELCOST_WALL );
01293                                           break;
01294 
01295                                     default:
01296                                           // wall with no orientation specified!?
01297                                           break;
01298                               }
01299                         }                       
01300                   }
01301                   else
01302                   {
01303                         if (!(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE || pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_NORMAL_ROOF))
01304                         {
01305                               fStructuresOnRoof = TRUE;
01306                         }
01307                   }
01308                   pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
01309             } while (pStructure != NULL);
01310 
01311             // HIGHEST LAYER
01312             if ((gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].pRoofHead != NULL))
01313             {                                               
01314                   if (!fStructuresOnRoof)
01315                   {
01316                         for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
01317                         {
01318                               SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_FLAT );
01319                         }
01320                   }
01321                   else
01322                   {
01323                         for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
01324                         {
01325                               SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
01326                         }
01327                   }
01328             }
01329             else
01330             { 
01331                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
01332                   {
01333                         SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
01334                   }
01335             }
01336       }
01337       else
01338       { // NO STRUCTURES IN TILE
01339             // consider just the land
01340 
01341             // Get terrain type
01342             ubTerrainID =     gpWorldLevelData[usGridNo].ubTerrainID; // = GetTerrainType( (INT16)usGridNo );
01343             for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)
01344             {
01345                   SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo ,ubDirLoop, 0, gTileTypeMovementCost[ ubTerrainID ] );
01346             }
01347 
01348 /*
01349             pLand = gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].pLandHead;
01350             if ( pLand != NULL )
01351             {
01352                   // Set cost here
01353                   // Get from tile database
01354                   TileElem = gTileDatabase[ pLand->usIndex ];
01355 
01356                   // Get terrain type
01357                   ubTerrainID =     GetTerrainType( (INT16)usGridNo );
01358 
01359                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)
01360                   {
01361                         SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo ,ubDirLoop, 0, gTileTypeMovementCost[ ubTerrainID ] );
01362                   }
01363             }
01364 */
01365             // HIGHEST LEVEL
01366             if (gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].pRoofHead != NULL)
01367             {                                               
01368                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
01369                   {
01370                         SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_FLAT );
01371                   }
01372             }
01373             else
01374             { 
01375                   for (ubDirLoop=0; ubDirLoop < 8; ubDirLoop++)   
01376                   {
01377                         SET_MOVEMENTCOST( usGridNo, ubDirLoop,  1, TRAVELCOST_OBSTACLE );
01378                   }
01379             }
01380       }
01381 }
01382 
01383 #define LOCAL_RADIUS 4
01384 
01385 void RecompileLocalMovementCosts( INT16 sCentreGridNo )
01386 {
01387       INT16       usGridNo;
01388       INT16       sGridX, sGridY;
01389       INT16       sCentreGridX, sCentreGridY;
01390       INT8        bDirLoop;         
01391 
01392       ConvertGridNoToXY( sCentreGridNo, &sCentreGridX, &sCentreGridY );
01393       for( sGridY = sCentreGridY - LOCAL_RADIUS; sGridY < sCentreGridY + LOCAL_RADIUS; sGridY++ )
01394       {
01395             for( sGridX = sCentreGridX - LOCAL_RADIUS; sGridX < sCentreGridX + LOCAL_RADIUS; sGridX++ )
01396             {
01397                   usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01398                   // times 2 for 2 levels, times 2 for UINT16s
01399 //                memset( &(gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo]), 0, MAXDIR * 2 * 2 );
01400                   if (usGridNo < WORLD_MAX)
01401                   {
01402                         for( bDirLoop = 0; bDirLoop < MAXDIR; bDirLoop++)
01403                         {
01404                               gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][0] = 0;
01405                               gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][1] = 0;
01406                         }
01407                   }
01408             }
01409       }
01410 
01411       // note the radius used in this loop is larger, to guarantee that the
01412       // edges of the recompiled areas are correct (i.e. there could be spillover)
01413       for( sGridY = sCentreGridY - LOCAL_RADIUS - 1; sGridY < sCentreGridY + LOCAL_RADIUS + 1; sGridY++ )
01414       {
01415             for( sGridX = sCentreGridX - LOCAL_RADIUS - 1; sGridX < sCentreGridX + LOCAL_RADIUS + 1; sGridX++ )
01416             {
01417                   usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01418                   if (usGridNo < WORLD_MAX)
01419                   {
01420                         CompileTileMovementCosts( usGridNo );
01421                   }
01422             }
01423       }
01424 }
01425 
01426 
01427 void RecompileLocalMovementCostsFromRadius( INT16 sCentreGridNo, INT8 bRadius )
01428 {
01429       INT16       usGridNo;
01430       INT16       sGridX, sGridY;
01431       INT16       sCentreGridX, sCentreGridY;
01432       INT8        bDirLoop;         
01433 
01434       ConvertGridNoToXY( sCentreGridNo, &sCentreGridX, &sCentreGridY );
01435       if (bRadius == 0)
01436       {
01437             // one tile check only
01438             for( bDirLoop = 0; bDirLoop < MAXDIR; bDirLoop++)
01439             {
01440                   gubWorldMovementCosts[sCentreGridNo][bDirLoop][0] = 0;
01441                   gubWorldMovementCosts[sCentreGridNo][bDirLoop][1] = 0;
01442             }
01443             CompileTileMovementCosts( sCentreGridNo );
01444       }
01445       else
01446       {
01447             for( sGridY = sCentreGridY - bRadius; sGridY < sCentreGridY + bRadius; sGridY++ )
01448             {
01449                   for( sGridX = sCentreGridX - bRadius; sGridX < sCentreGridX + bRadius; sGridX++ )
01450                   {
01451                         usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01452                         // times 2 for 2 levels, times 2 for UINT16s
01453       //                memset( &(gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo]), 0, MAXDIR * 2 * 2 );
01454                         if (usGridNo < WORLD_MAX)
01455                         {
01456                               for( bDirLoop = 0; bDirLoop < MAXDIR; bDirLoop++)
01457                               {
01458                                     gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][0] = 0;
01459                                     gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][1] = 0;
01460                               }
01461                         }
01462                   }
01463             }
01464 
01465             // note the radius used in this loop is larger, to guarantee that the
01466             // edges of the recompiled areas are correct (i.e. there could be spillover)
01467             for( sGridY = sCentreGridY - bRadius - 1; sGridY < sCentreGridY + bRadius + 1; sGridY++ )
01468             {
01469                   for( sGridX = sCentreGridX - bRadius - 1; sGridX < sCentreGridX + bRadius + 1; sGridX++ )
01470                   {
01471                         usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01472                         if (usGridNo < WORLD_MAX)
01473                         {
01474                               CompileTileMovementCosts( usGridNo );
01475                         }
01476                   }
01477             }
01478       }
01479 }
01480 
01481 void AddTileToRecompileArea( INT16 sGridNo )
01482 {
01483       INT16 sCheckGridNo;
01484       INT16 sCheckX;
01485       INT16 sCheckY;
01486 
01487       // Set flag to wipe and recompile MPs in this tile
01488       if (sGridNo < 0 || sGridNo >= WORLD_MAX)
01489       {
01490             return;
01491       }
01492       
01493       gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] |= MAPELEMENT_EXT_RECALCULATE_MOVEMENT;
01494 
01495       // check Top/Left of recompile region
01496       sCheckGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( NORTHWEST ) );
01497       sCheckX = sCheckGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
01498       sCheckY = sCheckGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
01499       if ( sCheckX < gsRecompileAreaLeft )
01500       {
01501             gsRecompileAreaLeft = sCheckX;
01502       }
01503       if ( sCheckY < gsRecompileAreaTop )
01504       {
01505             gsRecompileAreaTop = sCheckY;
01506       }
01507 
01508       // check Bottom/Right
01509       sCheckGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTHEAST ) );
01510       sCheckX = sCheckGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
01511       sCheckY = sCheckGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
01512       if ( sCheckX > gsRecompileAreaRight )
01513       {
01514             gsRecompileAreaRight = sCheckX;
01515       }
01516       if ( sCheckY > gsRecompileAreaBottom )
01517       {
01518             gsRecompileAreaBottom = sCheckY;
01519       }
01520 }
01521 
01522 void RecompileLocalMovementCostsInAreaWithFlags( void )
01523 {
01524       INT16       usGridNo;
01525       INT16       sGridX, sGridY;
01526       INT8        bDirLoop;         
01527 
01528       for( sGridY = gsRecompileAreaTop; sGridY <= gsRecompileAreaBottom; sGridY++ )
01529       {
01530             for( sGridX = gsRecompileAreaLeft; sGridX < gsRecompileAreaRight; sGridX++ )
01531             {
01532                   usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01533                   if ( usGridNo < WORLD_MAX && gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_RECALCULATE_MOVEMENT )
01534                   {
01535                         // wipe MPs in this tile!
01536                         for( bDirLoop = 0; bDirLoop < MAXDIR; bDirLoop++)
01537                         {
01538                               gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][0] = 0;
01539                               gubWorldMovementCosts[usGridNo][bDirLoop][1] = 0;
01540                         }
01541                         // reset flag
01542                         gpWorldLevelData[ usGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] &= (~MAPELEMENT_EXT_RECALCULATE_MOVEMENT); 
01543                   }
01544             }
01545       }
01546 
01547       for( sGridY = gsRecompileAreaTop; sGridY <= gsRecompileAreaBottom; sGridY++ )
01548       {
01549             for( sGridX = gsRecompileAreaLeft; sGridX <= gsRecompileAreaRight; sGridX++ )
01550             {
01551                   usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01552                   if (usGridNo < WORLD_MAX)
01553                   {
01554                         CompileTileMovementCosts( usGridNo );
01555                   }
01556             }
01557       }
01558 }
01559 
01560 void RecompileLocalMovementCostsForWall( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubOrientation )
01561 {
01562       INT8        bDirLoop;         
01563       INT16       sUp, sDown, sLeft, sRight;
01564       INT16       sX, sY, sTempGridNo;
01565 
01566       switch( ubOrientation )
01567       {
01568             case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01569             case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
01570                   sUp = -1;
01571                   sDown = 1;
01572                   sLeft = 0;
01573                   sRight = 1;
01574                   break;
01575             case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01576             case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
01577                   sUp = 0;
01578                   sDown = 1;
01579                   sLeft = -1;
01580                   sRight = 1;
01581                   break;
01582             default:
01583                   return;
01584       }
01585 
01586       for ( sY = sUp; sY <= sDown; sY++ )
01587       {
01588             for ( sX = sLeft; sX <= sRight; sX++ )
01589             {
01590                   sTempGridNo = sGridNo + sX + sY * WORLD_COLS;
01591                   for( bDirLoop = 0; bDirLoop < MAXDIR; bDirLoop++)
01592                   {
01593                         gubWorldMovementCosts[sTempGridNo][bDirLoop][0] = 0;
01594                         gubWorldMovementCosts[sTempGridNo][bDirLoop][1] = 0;
01595                   }
01596 
01597                   CompileTileMovementCosts( sTempGridNo );                    
01598             }
01599       }
01600 }
01601 
01602 
01603 
01604 // GLOBAL WORLD MANIPULATION FUNCTIONS
01605 void CompileWorldMovementCosts( )
01606 {
01607       UINT16                              usGridNo;
01608 
01609       memset( gubWorldMovementCosts, 0, sizeof( gubWorldMovementCosts ) );
01610 
01611       CompileWorldTerrainIDs();
01612       for( usGridNo = 0; usGridNo < WORLD_MAX; usGridNo++ )
01613       {
01614             CompileTileMovementCosts( usGridNo );
01615       }
01616 }
01617 
01618 
01619 // SAVING CODE
01620 BOOLEAN SaveWorld( UINT8 * puiFilename )
01621 {
01622 #ifdef JA2EDITOR
01623       INT32             cnt;
01624       UINT32            uiSoldierSize;
01625       UINT32            uiType;
01626       UINT32            uiFlags;
01627       UINT32            uiBytesWritten;
01628       UINT32            uiNumWarningsCaught = 0;
01629       HWFILE            hfile;
01630       LEVELNODE   *pLand;
01631       LEVELNODE   *pObject;
01632       LEVELNODE   *pStruct;
01633       LEVELNODE   *pShadow;
01634       LEVELNODE   *pRoof;
01635       LEVELNODE   *pOnRoof;
01636       LEVELNODE   *pTailLand=NULL;
01637       UINT16            usNumExitGrids = 0;
01638       UINT16    usTypeSubIndex;
01639       UINT8             LayerCount;
01640       UINT8             ObjectCount;
01641       UINT8             StructCount;
01642       UINT8             ShadowCount;
01643       UINT8             RoofCount;
01644       UINT8             OnRoofCount;
01645       UINT8             ubType;
01646       UINT8             ubTypeSubIndex;
01647       UINT8             ubTest = 1;
01648       CHAR8             aFilename[ 255 ];
01649       UINT8             ubCombine;
01650       UINT8             bCounts[ WORLD_MAX ][8];
01651 
01652       sprintf( aFilename, "MAPS\\%s", puiFilename );
01653 
01654       // Open file
01655       hfile = FileOpen( aFilename, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
01656 
01657       if ( !hfile )
01658       {
01659             return( FALSE );
01660       }
01661 
01662       // Write JA2 Version ID
01663       FileWrite( hfile, &gdMajorMapVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiBytesWritten );
01664       if( gdMajorMapVersion >= 4.00 )
01665       {
01666             FileWrite( hfile, &gubMinorMapVersion, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01667       }
01668 
01669       // Write FLAGS FOR WORLD
01670       //uiFlags = MAP_WORLDONLY_SAVED;
01671       uiFlags = 0;
01672       uiFlags |= MAP_FULLSOLDIER_SAVED;
01673       uiFlags |= MAP_EXITGRIDS_SAVED;
01674       uiFlags |= MAP_WORLDLIGHTS_SAVED;
01675       uiFlags |= MAP_DOORTABLE_SAVED;
01676       uiFlags |= MAP_WORLDITEMS_SAVED;
01677       uiFlags |= MAP_EDGEPOINTS_SAVED;
01678       if( gfBasement || gfCaves )
01679             uiFlags |= MAP_AMBIENTLIGHTLEVEL_SAVED;
01680       uiFlags |= MAP_NPCSCHEDULES_SAVED;
01681 
01682       FileWrite( hfile, &uiFlags, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01683 
01684       // Write tileset ID
01685       FileWrite( hfile, &giCurrentTilesetID, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01686       
01687       // Write SOLDIER CONTROL SIZE
01688       uiSoldierSize = sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE );
01689       FileWrite( hfile, &uiSoldierSize, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01690 
01691 
01692       // REMOVE WORLD VISIBILITY TILES
01693       RemoveWorldWireFrameTiles( );
01694 
01695 
01696       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01697   { 
01698 
01699             // Write out height values
01700             FileWrite( hfile, &gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].sHeight, sizeof( INT16 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01701 
01702       }
01703 
01704       // Write out # values - we'll have no more than 15 per level!
01705       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01706   { 
01707             // Determine number of land
01708             pLand = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pLandHead;
01709             LayerCount = 0;
01710   
01711             while( pLand != NULL )
01712             {
01713                   LayerCount++;
01714                   pLand = pLand->pNext;
01715             }
01716             if( LayerCount > 15 )
01717             {
01718                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  Land count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01719                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01720                         LayerCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01721                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01722                   FileClose( hfile );
01723                   return FALSE;
01724             }
01725             if( LayerCount > 10 )
01726             {
01727                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01728                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01729                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  Land count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01730                         uiNumWarningsCaught, LayerCount, cnt );
01731             }
01732             bCounts[ cnt ][ 0 ] = LayerCount;
01733 
01734             // Combine # of land layers with worlddef flags ( first 4 bits )
01735             ubCombine = (UINT8)( ( LayerCount&0xf ) | ( (gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags&0xf)<<4 ) );
01736             // Write combination
01737             FileWrite( hfile, &ubCombine, sizeof( ubCombine ), &uiBytesWritten );
01738 
01739 
01740             // Determine # of objects
01741             pObject = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pObjectHead;
01742             ObjectCount = 0;
01743             while( pObject != NULL )
01744             {
01745                   // DON'T WRITE ANY ITEMS
01746                   if ( !(pObject->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ITEM ) ) )
01747                   {
01748                         UINT32 uiTileType;
01749                         //Make sure this isn't a UI Element
01750                         GetTileType( pObject->usIndex, &uiTileType );
01751                         if( uiTileType < FIRSTPOINTERS )
01752                               ObjectCount++;
01753                   }
01754                   pObject = pObject->pNext;
01755             }
01756             if( ObjectCount > 15 )
01757             {
01758                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  Object count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01759                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01760                         ObjectCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01761                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01762                   FileClose( hfile );
01763                   return FALSE;
01764             }
01765             if( ObjectCount > 10 )
01766             {
01767                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01768                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01769                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  Object count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01770                         uiNumWarningsCaught, ObjectCount, cnt );
01771             }
01772             bCounts[ cnt ][ 1 ] = ObjectCount;
01773 
01774             // Determine # of structs
01775             pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pStructHead;
01776             StructCount = 0;
01777             while( pStruct != NULL )
01778             {
01779                   // DON'T WRITE ANY ITEMS
01780                   if ( !(pStruct->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ITEM ) ) )
01781                   {
01782                         StructCount++;
01783                   }
01784                   pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
01785             }
01786             if( StructCount > 15 )
01787             {
01788                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  Struct count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01789                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01790                         StructCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01791                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01792                   FileClose( hfile );
01793                   return FALSE;
01794             }
01795             if( StructCount > 10 )
01796             {
01797                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01798                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01799                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  Struct count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01800                         uiNumWarningsCaught, StructCount, cnt );
01801             }
01802             bCounts[ cnt ][ 2 ] = StructCount;
01803 
01804             ubCombine = (UINT8)( ( ObjectCount&0xf ) | ( (StructCount&0xf)<<4 ) );
01805             // Write combination
01806             FileWrite( hfile, &ubCombine, sizeof( ubCombine ), &uiBytesWritten );
01807 
01808 
01809             // Determine # of shadows
01810             pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pShadowHead;
01811             ShadowCount = 0;
01812             while( pShadow != NULL )
01813             {
01814                   // Don't write any shadowbuddys or exit grids
01815                   if ( !(pShadow->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_BUDDYSHADOW  | LEVELNODE_EXITGRID ) ) )
01816                   {
01817                         ShadowCount++;
01818                   }
01819                   pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
01820             }
01821             if( ShadowCount > 15 )
01822             {
01823                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  Shadow count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01824                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01825                         ShadowCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01826                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01827                   FileClose( hfile );
01828                   return FALSE;
01829             }
01830             if( ShadowCount > 10 )
01831             {
01832                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01833                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01834                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  Shadow count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01835                         uiNumWarningsCaught, ShadowCount, cnt );
01836             }
01837             bCounts[ cnt ][ 3 ] = ShadowCount;
01838 
01839             // Determine # of Roofs
01840             pRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pRoofHead;
01841             RoofCount = 0;
01842             while( pRoof != NULL )
01843             {
01844                   // ATE: Don't save revealed roof info...
01845                   if ( pRoof->usIndex != SLANTROOFCEILING1 )
01846                   {
01847                         RoofCount++;
01848                   }
01849                   pRoof = pRoof->pNext;
01850             }
01851             if( RoofCount > 15 )
01852             {
01853                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  Roof count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01854                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01855                         RoofCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01856                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01857                   FileClose( hfile );
01858                   return FALSE;
01859             }
01860             if( RoofCount > 10 )
01861             {
01862                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01863                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01864                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  Roof count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01865                         uiNumWarningsCaught, RoofCount, cnt );
01866             }
01867             bCounts[ cnt ][ 4 ] = RoofCount;
01868 
01869             ubCombine = (UINT8)( ( ShadowCount&0xf ) | ( (RoofCount&0xf)<<4 ) );
01870             // Write combination
01871             FileWrite( hfile, &ubCombine, sizeof( ubCombine ), &uiBytesWritten );
01872
