01873 
01874             // Write OnRoof layer
01875             // Determine # of OnRoofs
01876             pOnRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pOnRoofHead;
01877             OnRoofCount = 0;
01878 
01879             while( pOnRoof != NULL )
01880             {
01881                   OnRoofCount++;
01882                   pOnRoof = pOnRoof->pNext;
01883             }
01884             if( OnRoofCount > 15 )
01885             {
01886                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"SAVE ABORTED!  OnRoof count too high (%d) for gridno %d."
01887                         L"  Need to fix before map can be saved!  There are %d additional warnings.", 
01888                         OnRoofCount, cnt, uiNumWarningsCaught );
01889                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01890                   FileClose( hfile );
01891                   return FALSE;
01892             }
01893             if( OnRoofCount > 10 )
01894             {
01895                   uiNumWarningsCaught++;
01896                   gfErrorCatch = TRUE;
01897                   swprintf( gzErrorCatchString, L"Warnings %d -- Last warning:  OnRoof count warning of %d for gridno %d.", 
01898                         uiNumWarningsCaught, OnRoofCount, cnt );
01899             }
01900             bCounts[ cnt ][ 5 ] = RoofCount;
01901 
01902 
01903             // Write combination of onroof and nothing...
01904             ubCombine = (UINT8)( ( OnRoofCount&0xf ) );
01905             // Write combination
01906             FileWrite( hfile, &ubCombine, sizeof( ubCombine ), &uiBytesWritten );
01907 
01908 
01909 
01910       }
01911 
01912       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01913   { 
01914 
01915             if ( bCounts[ cnt ][ 0 ] == 0 )
01916             {
01917  
01918                   FileWrite( hfile, &ubTest, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01919                   FileWrite( hfile, &ubTest, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01920             }
01921             else
01922             {
01923 
01924                   // Write land layers
01925                   // Write out land peices backwards so that they are loaded properly
01926                   pLand = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pLandHead;
01927                   // GET TAIL
01928                   while( pLand != NULL )
01929                   {
01930                         pTailLand = pLand;
01931                         pLand = pLand->pNext;
01932                   }
01933 
01934                   while( pTailLand != NULL )
01935                   {
01936                         // Write out object type and sub-index
01937                         GetTileType( pTailLand->usIndex, &uiType );
01938                         ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
01939                         GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndexChar( uiType, pTailLand->usIndex, &ubTypeSubIndex );
01940                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01941                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01942       
01943                         pTailLand = pTailLand->pPrevNode;
01944                   }
01945             }
01946       }
01947   
01948       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01949   { 
01950 
01951             // Write object layer
01952             pObject = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pObjectHead;
01953             while( pObject != NULL )
01954             {
01955                   // DON'T WRITE ANY ITEMS
01956                   if ( !(pObject->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ITEM ) ) )
01957                   {
01958                         // Write out object type and sub-index
01959                         GetTileType( pObject->usIndex, &uiType );
01960                         //Make sure this isn't a UI Element
01961                         if( uiType < FIRSTPOINTERS )
01962                         {
01963                               //We are writing 2 bytes for the type subindex in the object layer because the
01964                               //ROADPIECES slot contains more than 256 subindices.
01965                               ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
01966                               GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndex( uiType, pObject->usIndex, &usTypeSubIndex );
01967                               FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01968                               FileWrite( hfile, &usTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT16 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01969                         }
01970                   }
01971                   pObject = pObject->pNext;
01972             }
01973       }
01974 
01975       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01976   { 
01977             // Write struct layer
01978             pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pStructHead;
01979             while( pStruct != NULL )
01980             {
01981                   // DON'T WRITE ANY ITEMS
01982                   if ( !(pStruct->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_ITEM ) ) )
01983                   {
01984                         // Write out object type and sub-index
01985                         GetTileType( pStruct->usIndex, &uiType );
01986                         ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
01987                         GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndexChar( uiType, pStruct->usIndex, &ubTypeSubIndex );
01988                               FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01989                               FileWrite( hfile, &ubTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
01990                   }
01991 
01992                   pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
01993             }
01994       }
01995 
01996       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01997   { 
01998             // Write shadows
01999             pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pShadowHead;
02000             while( pShadow != NULL )
02001             {
02002                   // Dont't write any buddys or exit grids
02003                   if ( !(pShadow->uiFlags & ( LEVELNODE_BUDDYSHADOW | LEVELNODE_EXITGRID ) ) )
02004                   {
02005                         // Write out object type and sub-index
02006                         // Write out object type and sub-index
02007                         GetTileType( pShadow->usIndex, &uiType );
02008                         ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
02009                         GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndexChar( uiType, pShadow->usIndex, &ubTypeSubIndex );
02010                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02011                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02012 
02013                   }
02014                   else if( pShadow->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_EXITGRID )
02015                   {     //count the number of exitgrids
02016                         usNumExitGrids++;
02017                   }
02018 
02019                   pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
02020             }
02021       }
02022 
02023       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02024   { 
02025             pRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pRoofHead;
02026             while( pRoof != NULL )
02027             {
02028                   // ATE: Don't save revealed roof info...
02029                   if ( pRoof->usIndex != SLANTROOFCEILING1 )
02030                   {
02031                         // Write out object type and sub-index
02032                         GetTileType( pRoof->usIndex, &uiType );
02033                         ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
02034                         GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndexChar( uiType, pRoof->usIndex, &ubTypeSubIndex );
02035                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02036                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02037                   }
02038 
02039                   pRoof = pRoof->pNext;
02040             }
02041       }
02042       
02043       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02044   { 
02045             // Write OnRoofs
02046             pOnRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pOnRoofHead;
02047             while( pOnRoof != NULL )
02048             {
02049                   // Write out object type and sub-index
02050                   GetTileType( pOnRoof->usIndex, &uiType );
02051                   ubType = (UINT8)uiType;
02052                   GetTypeSubIndexFromTileIndexChar( uiType, pOnRoof->usIndex, &ubTypeSubIndex );
02053                   FileWrite( hfile, &ubType, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02054                   FileWrite( hfile, &ubTypeSubIndex, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02055 
02056 
02057                   pOnRoof = pOnRoof->pNext;
02058             }
02059       }
02060 
02061       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02062   { 
02063             // Write out room information
02064             FileWrite( hfile, &gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ], sizeof( INT8 ), &uiBytesWritten );
02065 
02066       }
02067 
02068       if ( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDITEMS_SAVED )
02069       {
02070             // Write out item information
02071             SaveWorldItemsToMap( hfile );
02072       }
02073 
02074       if( uiFlags & MAP_AMBIENTLIGHTLEVEL_SAVED )
02075       {
02076             FileWrite( hfile, &gfBasement, 1, &uiBytesWritten );
02077             FileWrite( hfile, &gfCaves, 1, &uiBytesWritten );
02078             FileWrite( hfile, &ubAmbientLightLevel, 1, &uiBytesWritten );
02079       }
02080 
02081       if( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDLIGHTS_SAVED )
02082       {
02083 
02084             SaveMapLights( hfile );
02085       }
02086 
02087       SaveMapInformation( hfile );
02088       
02089       if( uiFlags & MAP_FULLSOLDIER_SAVED )
02090       {
02091             SaveSoldiersToMap( hfile );
02092       }
02093       if( uiFlags & MAP_EXITGRIDS_SAVED )
02094       {
02095             SaveExitGrids( hfile, usNumExitGrids );
02096       }
02097       if( uiFlags & MAP_DOORTABLE_SAVED )
02098       {
02099             SaveDoorTableToMap( hfile );
02100       }
02101       if( uiFlags & MAP_EDGEPOINTS_SAVED )
02102       {
02103             CompileWorldMovementCosts();
02104             GenerateMapEdgepoints();
02105             SaveMapEdgepoints( hfile );
02106       }
02107       if( uiFlags & MAP_NPCSCHEDULES_SAVED )
02108       {
02109             SaveSchedules( hfile );
02110       }
02111 
02112       FileClose( hfile );
02113 
02114       sprintf( (char *)gubFilename, (char *)puiFilename );
02115 #endif //JA2EDITOR
02116 
02117       return( TRUE );
02118 }
02119 
02120 
02121 #define NUM_DIR_SEARCHES                        5
02122 INT8  bDirectionsForShadowSearch[ NUM_DIR_SEARCHES ] =
02123 {
02124        WEST,
02125        SOUTHWEST,
02126        SOUTH, 
02127        SOUTHEAST,
02128        EAST
02129 };
02130 
02131 void OptimizeMapForShadows( )
02132 {
02133       INT32 cnt, dir;
02134       INT16 sNewGridNo;
02135       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02136       {
02137             // CHECK IF WE ARE A TREE HERE
02138             if ( IsTreePresentAtGridno( (INT16)cnt ) )
02139             {
02140                   // CHECK FOR A STRUCTURE A FOOTPRINT AWAY
02141                   for ( dir = 0; dir < NUM_DIR_SEARCHES; dir++ )
02142                   {
02143                         sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, (UINT16)DirectionInc( bDirectionsForShadowSearch[ dir ] ) );
02144                   
02145                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sNewGridNo ].pStructureHead == NULL )
02146                         {
02147                               break;                              
02148                         }
02149                   }
02150                   // If we made it here, remove shadow!
02151                   // We're full of structures
02152                   if ( dir == NUM_DIR_SEARCHES )
02153                   {
02154                         RemoveAllShadows( cnt );
02155                         // Display message to effect
02156                   }
02157             }
02158       }
02159 }
02160 
02161 void SetBlueFlagFlags( void )
02162 {
02163       INT32       cnt;
02164       LEVELNODE * pNode;
02165 
02166       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02167       {
02168             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pStructHead;
02169             while ( pNode )
02170             {
02171                   if ( pNode->usIndex == BLUEFLAG_GRAPHIC)
02172                   {
02173                         gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_PLAYER_MINE_PRESENT;
02174                         break;
02175                   }
02176                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
02177             }
02178       }
02179 }
02180 
02181 void InitLoadedWorld( )
02182 {
02183       //if the current sector is not valid, dont init the world
02184       if( gWorldSectorX == 0 || gWorldSectorY == 0 )
02185       {
02186             return;
02187       }
02188 
02189       // COMPILE MOVEMENT COSTS
02190       CompileWorldMovementCosts( );
02191 
02192       // COMPILE INTERACTIVE TILES
02193       CompileInteractiveTiles( );
02194 
02195       // COMPILE WORLD VISIBLIY TILES
02196       CalculateWorldWireFrameTiles( TRUE );
02197 
02198       LightSpriteRenderAll();
02199 
02200       OptimizeMapForShadows( );
02201 
02202       SetInterfaceHeightLevel( );
02203 
02204       // ATE: if we have a slide location, remove it!
02205       gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget = NOWHERE;
02206 
02207       SetBlueFlagFlags();
02208 }
02209 
02210 #ifdef JA2EDITOR
02211 //This is a specialty function that is very similar to LoadWorld, except that it
02212 //doesn't actually load the world, it instead evaluates the map and generates summary
02213 //information for use within the summary editor.  The header is defined in Summary Info.h,
02214 //not worlddef.h -- though it's not likely this is going to be used anywhere where it would
02215 //matter.
02216 extern double MasterStart, MasterEnd;
02217 extern BOOLEAN gfUpdatingNow;
02218 
02219 BOOLEAN EvaluateWorld( UINT8 * pSector, UINT8 ubLevel )
02220 {
02221       FLOAT dMajorMapVersion;
02222       SUMMARYFILE *pSummary;
02223       HWFILE      hfile;
02224       MAPCREATE_STRUCT mapInfo;
02225       INT8 *pBuffer, *pBufferHead;
02226       UINT32                              uiFileSize;
02227       UINT32 uiFlags;
02228       UINT32 uiBytesRead;
02229       INT32 cnt;
02230       INT32 i;
02231       INT32 iTilesetID;
02232       UINT16 str[40];
02233       UINT8 bCounts[ WORLD_MAX ][8];
02234       UINT8 ubCombine;
02235       UINT8 szDirFilename[ 50 ];
02236       UINT8 szFilename[ 40 ];
02237       UINT8 ubMinorMapVersion;
02238 
02239 
02240       //Make sure the file exists... if not, then return false
02241       sprintf( (char *)szFilename, (char *)pSector );
02242       if( ubLevel % 4  )
02243       {
02244             UINT8 str[4];
02245             sprintf( (char *)str, "_b%d", ubLevel % 4 );
02246             strcat( szFilename, str );
02247       }
02248       if( ubLevel >= 4 )
02249       {
02250             strcat( szFilename, "_a" );
02251       }
02252       strcat( szFilename, ".dat" );
02253       sprintf( (char *)szDirFilename, "MAPS\\%s", szFilename );
02254 
02255       if( gfMajorUpdate )
02256       {
02257             if( !LoadWorld( szFilename ) ) //error
02258                   return FALSE;
02259             FileClearAttributes( (STR)szDirFilename );
02260             SaveWorld( szFilename );
02261       }
02262 
02263       hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szDirFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
02264       if( !hfile )
02265             return FALSE;
02266       
02267       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hfile );
02268       pBuffer = (INT8*)MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
02269       pBufferHead = pBuffer;
02270       FileRead( hfile, pBuffer, uiFileSize, &uiBytesRead );
02271       FileClose( hfile );
02272 
02273       swprintf( str, L"Analyzing map %S", szFilename );
02274       if( !gfUpdatingNow )
02275             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 0, 100, str );
02276       else
02277             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, (UINT16)MasterStart, (UINT16)MasterEnd, str );
02278 
02279       RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
02280       //RenderProgressBar( 1, 0 );
02281 
02282       //clear the summary file info
02283       pSummary = (SUMMARYFILE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ) );
02284       Assert( pSummary );
02285       memset( pSummary, 0, sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ) );
02286       pSummary->ubSummaryVersion = GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION;
02287       pSummary->dMajorMapVersion = gdMajorMapVersion;
02288 
02289       //skip JA2 Version ID
02290       LOADDATA( &dMajorMapVersion, pBuffer, sizeof( FLOAT ) );
02291       if( dMajorMapVersion >= 4.00 )
02292       {
02293             LOADDATA( &ubMinorMapVersion, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02294       }
02295 
02296       //Read FLAGS FOR WORLD
02297       LOADDATA( &uiFlags, pBuffer, sizeof( INT32 ) );
02298 
02299       //Read tilesetID
02300       LOADDATA( &iTilesetID, pBuffer, sizeof( INT32 ) );
02301       pSummary->ubTilesetID = (UINT8)iTilesetID;
02302 
02303       //skip soldier size
02304       pBuffer += sizeof( INT32 );
02305 
02306       //skip height values
02307       pBuffer += sizeof( INT16 ) * WORLD_MAX;
02308 
02309       //read layer counts
02310       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02311   {
02312             if( !( cnt % 2560 ) )
02313             {
02314                   RenderProgressBar( 0, (cnt / 2560)+1 ); //1 - 10
02315                   //RenderProgressBar( 1, (cnt / 2560)+1 ); //1 - 10
02316             }
02317             // Read combination of land/world flags
02318             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02319             // split    
02320             bCounts[ cnt ][0] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02321             gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags |= (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02322             // Read #objects, structs
02323             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02324             // split    
02325             bCounts[ cnt ][1] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02326             bCounts[ cnt ][2] = (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02327             // Read shadows, roof
02328             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02329             // split    
02330             bCounts[ cnt ][3] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02331             bCounts[ cnt ][4] = (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02332       // Read OnRoof, nothing
02333             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02334             // split    
02335             bCounts[ cnt ][5] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02336             //bCounts[ cnt ][4] = (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02337             bCounts[ cnt ][6] = bCounts[cnt][0] + bCounts[cnt][1] + 
02338                                                                         bCounts[cnt][2] + bCounts[cnt][3] +
02339                                                                         bCounts[cnt][4] + bCounts[cnt][5];
02340       }
02341       //skip all layers
02342       for( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02343       {
02344             if( !( cnt % 320 ) )
02345             {
02346                   RenderProgressBar( 0, (cnt / 320)+11 ); //11 - 90
02347                   //RenderProgressBar( 1, (cnt / 320)+11 ); //11 - 90
02348             }
02349             pBuffer += sizeof( UINT16 ) * bCounts[cnt][6];
02350             pBuffer += bCounts[cnt][1];
02351       }
02352 
02353       //extract highest room number
02354       {
02355             UINT8 ubRoomNum;
02356             for( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02357             {
02358                   LOADDATA( &ubRoomNum, pBuffer, 1 );
02359                   if( ubRoomNum > pSummary->ubNumRooms )
02360                   {
02361                         pSummary->ubNumRooms = ubRoomNum;
02362                   }
02363             }
02364       }
02365 
02366       if( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDITEMS_SAVED )
02367       {
02368             UINT32 temp;
02369             RenderProgressBar( 0, 91 ); 
02370             //RenderProgressBar( 1, 91 ); 
02371             //get number of items (for now)
02372             LOADDATA( &temp, pBuffer, 4 );
02373             pSummary->usNumItems = (UINT16)temp;
02374             //Important:  Saves the file position (byte offset) of the position where the numitems
02375             //            resides.  Checking this value and comparing to usNumItems will ensure validity.
02376             if( pSummary->usNumItems )
02377             {
02378                   pSummary->uiNumItemsPosition = pBuffer - pBufferHead - 4;
02379             }
02380             //Skip the contents of the world items.
02381             pBuffer += sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * pSummary->usNumItems;
02382       }
02383 
02384       if( uiFlags & MAP_AMBIENTLIGHTLEVEL_SAVED )
02385       {
02386             pBuffer += 3;
02387       }
02388 
02389       if( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDLIGHTS_SAVED )
02390       {
02391             UINT8 ubTemp;
02392             RenderProgressBar( 0, 92 ); 
02393             //RenderProgressBar( 1, 92 ); 
02394             //skip number of light palette entries
02395             LOADDATA( &ubTemp, pBuffer, 1 );
02396             pBuffer += sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * ubTemp;
02397             //get number of lights
02398             LOADDATA( &pSummary->usNumLights, pBuffer, 2 );
02399             //skip the light loading
02400             for( cnt = 0; cnt < pSummary->usNumLights; cnt++ )
02401             {
02402                   UINT8 ubStrLen;
02403                   pBuffer += sizeof( LIGHT_SPRITE );
02404                   LOADDATA( &ubStrLen, pBuffer, 1 );
02405                   if( ubStrLen )
02406                   {
02407                         pBuffer += ubStrLen;
02408                   }
02409             }
02410       }
02411 
02412       //read the mapinformation
02413       LOADDATA( &mapInfo, pBuffer, sizeof( MAPCREATE_STRUCT ) );
02414 
02415       memcpy( &pSummary->MapInfo, &mapInfo, sizeof( MAPCREATE_STRUCT ) );
02416       
02417       if( uiFlags & MAP_FULLSOLDIER_SAVED )
02418       {
02419             TEAMSUMMARY *pTeam=NULL;
02420             BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT basic;
02421             SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT priority;
02422             RenderProgressBar( 0, 94 ); 
02423             //RenderProgressBar( 1, 94 ); 
02424 
02425             pSummary->uiEnemyPlacementPosition = pBuffer - pBufferHead;
02426 
02427             for( i=0; i < pSummary->MapInfo.ubNumIndividuals ; i++ )
02428             {
02429                   LOADDATA( &basic, pBuffer, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
02430 
02431                   switch( basic.bTeam )
02432                   {
02433                         case ENEMY_TEAM:        pTeam = &pSummary->EnemyTeam;             break;
02434                         case CREATURE_TEAM:     pTeam = &pSummary->CreatureTeam;    break;
02435                         case MILITIA_TEAM:      pTeam = &pSummary->RebelTeam;             break;
02436                         case CIV_TEAM:                pTeam = &pSummary->CivTeam;                     break;
02437                   }
02438                   if( basic.bOrders == RNDPTPATROL || basic.bOrders == POINTPATROL )
02439                   { //make sure the placement has at least one waypoint.
02440                         if( !basic.bPatrolCnt )
02441                         {
02442                               pSummary->ubEnemiesReqWaypoints++;
02443                         }
02444                   }
02445                   else if( basic.bPatrolCnt )
02446                   {
02447                         pSummary->ubEnemiesHaveWaypoints++;
02448                   }
02449                   if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
02450                         pTeam->ubExistance++;
02451                   switch( basic.bRelativeAttributeLevel )
02452                   {
02453                         case 0:     pTeam->ubBadA++;        break;
02454                         case 1:     pTeam->ubPoorA++;       break;
02455                         case 2:     pTeam->ubAvgA++;        break;
02456                         case 3:     pTeam->ubGoodA++;       break;
02457                         case 4:     pTeam->ubGreatA++;      break;
02458                   }
02459                   switch( basic.bRelativeEquipmentLevel )
02460                   {
02461                         case 0:     pTeam->ubBadE++;        break;
02462                         case 1:     pTeam->ubPoorE++;       break;
02463                         case 2:     pTeam->ubAvgE++;        break;
02464                         case 3:     pTeam->ubGoodE++;       break;
02465                         case 4:     pTeam->ubGreatE++;      break;
02466                   }
02467                   if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
02468                   { //skip static priority placement 
02469                         LOADDATA( &priority, pBuffer, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
02470                         if( priority.ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
02471                               pTeam->ubProfile++;
02472                         else
02473                               pTeam->ubDetailed++;
02474                         if( basic.bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
02475                         {
02476                               if( priority.ubScheduleID )
02477                                     pSummary->ubCivSchedules++;
02478                               if( priority.bBodyType == COW )
02479                                     pSummary->ubCivCows++;
02480                               else if( priority.bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
02481                                     pSummary->ubCivBloodcats++;
02482                         }
02483                   }
02484                   if( basic.bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
02485                   {
02486                         switch( basic.ubSoldierClass )
02487                         {
02488                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
02489                                     pSummary->ubNumAdmins++;
02490                                     if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
02491                                           pSummary->ubAdminExistance++;
02492                                     if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
02493                                     {
02494                                           if( priority.ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
02495                                                 pSummary->ubAdminProfile++;
02496                                           else
02497                                                 pSummary->ubAdminDetailed++;
02498                                     }
02499                                     break;
02500                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
02501                                     pSummary->ubNumElites++;
02502                                     if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
02503                                           pSummary->ubEliteExistance++;
02504                                     if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
02505                                     {
02506                                           if( priority.ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
02507                                                 pSummary->ubEliteProfile++;
02508                                           else
02509                                                 pSummary->ubEliteDetailed++;
02510                                     }
02511                                     break;
02512                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
02513                                     pSummary->ubNumTroops++;
02514                                     if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
02515                                           pSummary->ubTroopExistance++;
02516                                     if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
02517                                     {
02518                                           if( priority.ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
02519                                                 pSummary->ubTroopProfile++;
02520                                           else
02521                                                 pSummary->ubTroopDetailed++;
02522                                     }
02523                                     break;
02524                         }
02525                   }
02526                   else if( basic.bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
02527                   {
02528                         if( basic.bBodyType == BLOODCAT )
02529                               pTeam->ubNumAnimals++;
02530                   }
02531                   pTeam->ubTotal++;
02532             }
02533             RenderProgressBar( 0, 96 ); 
02534             //RenderProgressBar( 1, 96 ); 
02535       }
02536 
02537       if( uiFlags & MAP_EXITGRIDS_SAVED )
02538       {
02539             EXITGRID exitGrid;
02540             INT32 loop;
02541             UINT16 usMapIndex;
02542             BOOLEAN fExitGridFound;
02543             RenderProgressBar( 0, 98 ); 
02544             //RenderProgressBar( 1, 98 ); 
02545 
02546             LOADDATA( &cnt, pBuffer, 2 );
02547 
02548             for( i = 0; i < cnt; i++ )
02549             {
02550                   LOADDATA( &usMapIndex, pBuffer, 2 );
02551                   LOADDATA( &exitGrid, pBuffer, 5 );
02552                   fExitGridFound = FALSE;
02553                   for( loop = 0; loop < pSummary->ubNumExitGridDests; loop++ )
02554                   {
02555                         if( pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].usGridNo == exitGrid.usGridNo && 
02556                                     pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorX == exitGrid.ubGotoSectorX &&
02557                                     pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorY == exitGrid.ubGotoSectorY &&
02558                                     pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorZ == exitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ )
02559                         { //same destination.
02560                               pSummary->usExitGridSize[ loop ]++;
02561                               fExitGridFound = TRUE;
02562                               break;
02563                         }
02564                   }
02565                   if( !fExitGridFound )
02566                   {
02567                         if( loop >= 4 )
02568                         {
02569                               pSummary->fTooManyExitGridDests = TRUE;
02570                         }
02571                         else
02572                         {
02573                               pSummary->ubNumExitGridDests++;
02574                               pSummary->usExitGridSize[ loop ]++;
02575                               pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].usGridNo = exitGrid.usGridNo;
02576                               pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorX = exitGrid.ubGotoSectorX;
02577                               pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorY = exitGrid.ubGotoSectorY;
02578                               pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorZ = exitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ;
02579                               if( pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorX != exitGrid.ubGotoSectorX ||
02580                                           pSummary->ExitGrid[ loop ].ubGotoSectorY != exitGrid.ubGotoSectorY )
02581                               {
02582                                     pSummary->fInvalidDest[ loop ] = TRUE;
02583                               }
02584                         }
02585                   }
02586             }
02587       }
02588 
02589       if( uiFlags & MAP_DOORTABLE_SAVED )
02590       {
02591             DOOR Door;
02592             
02593             LOADDATA( &pSummary->ubNumDoors, pBuffer, 1 );
02594 
02595             for( cnt = 0; cnt < pSummary->ubNumDoors; cnt++ )
02596             {
02597                   LOADDATA( &Door, pBuffer, sizeof( DOOR ) );
02598 
02599                   if( Door.ubTrapID && Door.ubLockID )
02600                         pSummary->ubNumDoorsLockedAndTrapped++;
02601                   else if( Door.ubLockID )
02602                         pSummary->ubNumDoorsLocked++;
02603                   else if( Door.ubTrapID )
02604                         pSummary->ubNumDoorsTrapped++;
02605             }
02606       }
02607 
02608       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 ); 
02609       //RenderProgressBar( 1, 100 ); 
02610 
02611       MemFree( pBufferHead );
02612 
02613       WriteSectorSummaryUpdate( szFilename, ubLevel, pSummary );
02614       return TRUE;
02615 }
02616 #endif
02617 
02618 extern UINT8 GetCurrentSummaryVersion();
02619 extern void LoadShadeTablesFromTextFile();
02620 
02621 BOOLEAN LoadWorld( UINT8 *    puiFilename )
02622 {
02623       HWFILE                              hfile;
02624       FLOAT                               dMajorMapVersion;
02625       UINT32                              uiFlags;
02626       UINT32                              uiBytesRead;
02627       UINT32                              uiSoldierSize;
02628       UINT32                              uiFileSize;
02629       UINT32                              fp, offset;
02630 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02631       UINT32                              uiStartTime;
02632       UINT32                              uiLoadWorldStartTime;
02633 #endif
02634       INT32                               cnt, cnt2;
02635       INT32                               iTilesetID;
02636       UINT16                              usTileIndex;
02637       UINT16                              usTypeSubIndex;
02638       UINT8                               ubType;
02639       UINT8                               ubSubIndex;
02640       CHAR8                               aFilename[ 50 ];
02641       UINT8                               ubCombine;
02642       UINT8                                     bCounts[ WORLD_MAX ][8];
02643       INT8                                *pBuffer;
02644       INT8                                *pBufferHead;
02645       BOOLEAN                             fGenerateEdgePoints = FALSE;
02646       UINT8                               ubMinorMapVersion;
02647 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02648       uiLoadWorldStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
02649 #endif
02650 
02651       LoadShadeTablesFromTextFile();
02652 
02653       // Append exension to filename!
02654       if ( gfForceLoad )      
02655       {
02656             sprintf( aFilename, "MAPS\\%s", gzForceLoadFile );
02657       }
02658       else
02659       {
02660             sprintf( aFilename, "MAPS\\%s", puiFilename );
02661       }
02662 
02663       // RESET FLAGS FOR OUTDOORS/INDOORS
02664       gfBasement = FALSE;
02665       gfCaves = FALSE;
02666 
02667       // Open file
02668       hfile = FileOpen( aFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
02669   
02670       if ( !hfile )
02671       {
02672             SET_ERROR(  "Could not load map file %S", aFilename );
02673             return( FALSE );
02674       }
02675 
02676       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 0, 1, L"Trashing world..." );
02677 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02678       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
02679 #endif
02680 
02681       TrashWorld();
02682 
02683 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02684       uiTrashWorldTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiStartTime;
02685 #endif
02686 
02687       LightReset();
02688 
02689       //Get the file size and alloc one huge buffer for it.
02690       //We will use this buffer to transfer all of the data from.
02691       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hfile );
02692       pBuffer = (INT8*)MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
02693       pBufferHead = pBuffer;
02694       FileRead( hfile, pBuffer, uiFileSize, &uiBytesRead );
02695       FileClose( hfile );
02696 
02697       // Read JA2 Version ID
02698       LOADDATA( &dMajorMapVersion, pBuffer, sizeof( FLOAT ) ); 
02699 
02700       // Lesh: disable this because now we accept any version map
02701       //#ifdef RUSSIAN
02702       //    if( dMajorMapVersion != 6.00 )
02703       //    {
02704       //          return FALSE;
02705       //    }
02706       //#endif
02707 
02708       LOADDATA( &ubMinorMapVersion, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02709       
02710       // CHECK FOR NON-COMPATIBLE VERSIONS!
02711       // CHECK FOR MAJOR MAP VERSION INCOMPATIBLITIES
02712       //if ( dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02713       //{
02714             //AssertMsg( 0, "Major version conflict.  Should have force updated this map already!!!" );
02715             //SET_ERROR(  "Incompatible JA2 map version: %f, map version is now at %f", gdLoadedMapVersion, gdMapVersion );
02716             //return( FALSE );
02717       //}
02718 
02719       // Read FLAGS FOR WORLD
02720       LOADDATA( &uiFlags, pBuffer, sizeof( INT32 ) );
02721 
02722       LOADDATA( &iTilesetID, pBuffer, sizeof( INT32 ) );
02723 
02724 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02725       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
02726 #endif
02727       CHECKF( LoadMapTileset( iTilesetID ) != FALSE );
02728 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02729       uiLoadMapTilesetTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiStartTime;
02730 #endif
02731 
02732       // Load soldier size
02733       LOADDATA( &uiSoldierSize, pBuffer, sizeof( INT32 ) );
02734 
02735       //FP 0x000010
02736 
02737       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02738   {
02739             // Read height values
02740             LOADDATA( &gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].sHeight, pBuffer, sizeof( INT16 ) );
02741       } 
02742 
02743       //FP 0x00c810
02744 
02745       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 35, 40, L"Counting layers..." );
02746       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02747 
02748       // Read layer counts
02749       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02750   {
02751             // Read combination of land/world flags
02752             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02753 
02754             // split    
02755             bCounts[ cnt ][0] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02756             gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags |= (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02757 
02758             // Read #objects, structs
02759             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02760 
02761             // split    
02762             bCounts[ cnt ][1] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02763             bCounts[ cnt ][2] = (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02764 
02765             // Read shadows, roof
02766             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02767 
02768             // split    
02769             bCounts[ cnt ][3] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02770             bCounts[ cnt ][4] = (UINT8)((ubCombine&0xf0)>>4);
02771 
02772       // Read OnRoof, nothing
02773             LOADDATA( &ubCombine, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02774 
02775             // split    
02776             bCounts[ cnt ][5] = (UINT8)(ubCombine&0xf);
02777       }
02778 
02779       //FP 0x025810
02780       fp = 0x025810;
02781       offset = 0;
02782 
02783       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 40, 43, L"Loading land layers...");
02784       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02785 
02786       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02787       {
02788             // Read new values
02789             if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 0 ] > 10 )
02790             {
02791                   cnt = cnt;
02792             }
02793             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 0 ]; cnt2++ )
02794             {
02795                   LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02796                   LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02797 
02798                   // Get tile index
02799                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02800 
02801                   // Add layer
02802                   AddLandToHead( cnt, usTileIndex );
02803 
02804                   offset += 2;
02805             }
02806       }
02807 
02808       fp += offset;
02809       offset = 0;
02810 
02811       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 43, 46, L"Loading object layer...");
02812       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02813 
02814       if( 0 )
02815       { //Old loads 
02816             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02817             {
02818                   // Set objects
02819                   for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 1 ]; cnt2++ )
02820                   {
02821 
02822                         LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02823                         LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02824                         if ( ubType >= FIRSTPOINTERS ) 
02825                         {
02826                               continue;
02827                         }
02828                         // Get tile index
02829                         GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02830                         // Add layer
02831                         AddObjectToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02832                   }
02833             }
02834       }
02835       else
02836       { //New load require UINT16 for the type subindex due to the fact that ROADPIECES
02837             //contain over 300 type subindices.
02838             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02839             {
02840                   // Set objects
02841                   if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 1 ] > 10 )
02842                   {
02843                         cnt = cnt;
02844                   }
02845                   for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 1 ]; cnt2++ )
02846                   {
02847 
02848                         LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02849                         LOADDATA( &usTypeSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT16 ) );
02850                         if ( ubType >= FIRSTPOINTERS ) 
02851                         {
02852                               continue;
02853                         }
02854                         // Get tile index
02855                         GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, usTypeSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02856                         // Add layer
02857                         AddObjectToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02858 
02859                         offset += 3;
02860                   }
02861             }
02862       }
02863 
02864       fp += offset;
02865       offset = 0;
02866 
02867       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 46, 49, L"Loading struct layer..." );
02868       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02869 
02870       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02871       {
02872             // Set structs
02873             if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 2 ] > 10 )
02874             {
02875                   cnt = cnt;
02876             }
02877             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 2 ]; cnt2++ )
02878             {
02879                   LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02880                   LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02881 
02882                   // Get tile index
02883                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02884 
02885       if ( ubMinorMapVersion <= 25 )
02886       {
02887         // Check patching for phantom menace struct data...
02888         if ( gTileDatabase[ usTileIndex ].uiFlags & UNDERFLOW_FILLER )
02889         {
02890                       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, 1, &usTileIndex );  
02891         }
02892       }
02893 
02894                   // Add layer
02895                   AddStructToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02896 
02897                   offset += 2;
02898             }
02899       }
02900 
02901       fp += offset;
02902       offset = 0;
02903 
02904       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 49, 52, L"Loading shadow layer..." );
02905       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02906 
02907       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02908       {
02909             if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 3 ] > 10 )
02910             {
02911                   cnt = cnt;
02912             }
02913             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 3 ]; cnt2++ )
02914             {
02915                   LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02916                   LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02917 
02918                   // Get tile index
02919                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02920 
02921                   // Add layer
02922                   AddShadowToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02923 
02924                   offset += 2;
02925             }
02926       }
02927 
02928       fp += offset;
02929       offset = 0;
02930 
02931       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 52, 55, L"Loading roof layer..." );
02932       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02933 
02934       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02935       {
02936             if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 4 ] > 10 )
02937             {
02938                   cnt = cnt;
02939             }
02940             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 4 ]; cnt2++ )
02941             {
02942                   LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02943                   LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02944 
02945                   // Get tile index
02946                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02947 
02948                   // Add layer
02949                   AddRoofToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02950 
02951                   offset += 2;
02952             }
02953       }
02954 
02955       fp += offset;
02956       offset = 0;
02957 
02958       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 55, 58, L"Loading on roof layer..." );
02959       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02960 
02961       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02962       {
02963             if( bCounts[ cnt ][ 5 ] > 10 )
02964             {
02965                   cnt = cnt;
02966             }
02967             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < bCounts[ cnt ][ 5 ]; cnt2++ )
02968             {
02969                   LOADDATA( &ubType, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02970                   LOADDATA( &ubSubIndex, pBuffer, sizeof( UINT8 ) );
02971 
02972                   // Get tile index
02973                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( ubType, ubSubIndex, &usTileIndex );
02974 
02975                   // Add layer
02976                   AddOnRoofToTail( cnt, usTileIndex );
02977 
02978                   offset += 2;
02979             }
02980       }
02981 
02982       fp += offset;
02983       offset = 0;
02984 
02985       // Lesh: read additional bytes for map major version 6.00
02986       if( dMajorMapVersion == 6.00 )
02987       {
02988             UINT32 uiNums[37];
02989             LOADDATA( uiNums, pBuffer, 37 * sizeof( INT32 ) );
02990             dMajorMapVersion = 5.00;
02991       }
02992 
02993       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 58, 59, L"Loading room information..." );
02994       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02995 
02996       #ifdef JA2EDITOR
02997             gubMaxRoomNumber = 0;
02998             for( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
02999             {
03000                   // Read room information
03001                   LOADDATA( &gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ], pBuffer, sizeof( INT8 ) );
03002                         //Got to set the max room number
03003                         if( gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ] > gubMaxRoomNumber )
03004                               gubMaxRoomNumber = gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ];
03005             }
03006             if( gubMaxRoomNumber < 255 )
03007                   gubMaxRoomNumber++;
03008       #else
03009             LOADDATA( gubWorldRoomInfo, pBuffer, sizeof( INT8 ) * WORLD_MAX );
03010       #endif
03011 
03012       // ATE; Memset this array!
03013       if( 0 )
03014       { //for debugging purposes
03015             memset( gubWorldRoomInfo, 0, sizeof( gubWorldRoomInfo ) );
03016       }
03017 
03018       memset( gubWorldRoomHidden, TRUE, sizeof( gubWorldRoomHidden ) );
03019 
03020       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 59, 61, L"Loading items..." );
03021       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
03022 
03023       if( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDITEMS_SAVED )
03024       {
03025             // Load out item information
03026             gfLoadPitsWithoutArming = TRUE;
03027             LoadWorldItemsFromMap( &pBuffer );
03028             gfLoadPitsWithoutArming = FALSE;
03029       }
03030 
03031       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 62, 85, L"Loading lights..." );
03032       RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03033 
03034       if( uiFlags & MAP_AMBIENTLIGHTLEVEL_SAVED )
03035       { //Ambient light levels are only saved in underground levels
03036             LOADDATA( &gfBasement, pBuffer, 1 );
03037             LOADDATA( &gfCaves, pBuffer, 1 );
03038             LOADDATA( &ubAmbientLightLevel, pBuffer, 1 );
03039       }
03040       else
03041       { //We are above ground.
03042             gfBasement = FALSE;
03043             gfCaves = FALSE;
03044             if( !gfEditMode && guiCurrentScreen != MAPUTILITY_SCREEN )
03045             {
03046                   ubAmbientLightLevel = GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel();
03047             }
03048             else
03049             {
03050                   ubAmbientLightLevel = 4;
03051             }
03052       }
03053 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03054       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
03055 #endif
03056       if( uiFlags & MAP_WORLDLIGHTS_SAVED )
03057       {
03058             LoadMapLights( &pBuffer );
03059       }
03060       else
03061       {
03062             // Set some default value for lighting
03063             SetDefaultWorldLightingColors( );
03064       }
03065       LightSetBaseLevel( ubAmbientLightLevel );
03066 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03067       uiLoadMapLightsTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiStartTime;
03068 #endif
03069 
03070 
03071       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 85, 86, L"Loading map information..." );
03072       RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03073 
03074       LoadMapInformation( &pBuffer );
03075       
03076       if( uiFlags & MAP_FULLSOLDIER_SAVED )
03077       {
03078             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 86, 87, L"Loading placements..." );
03079             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03080             LoadSoldiersFromMap( &pBuffer );
03081       }
03082       if( uiFlags & MAP_EXITGRIDS_SAVED )
03083       {
03084             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 87, 88, L"Loading exit grids..." );
03085             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03086             LoadExitGrids( &pBuffer );
03087       }
03088       if( uiFlags & MAP_DOORTABLE_SAVED )
03089       {
03090             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 89, 90, L"Loading door tables..." );
03091             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03092             LoadDoorTableFromMap( &pBuffer );
03093       }
03094       if( uiFlags & MAP_EDGEPOINTS_SAVED )
03095       {
03096             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 90, 91, L"Loading edgepoints..." );
03097             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03098             if( !LoadMapEdgepoints( &pBuffer ) )
03099                   fGenerateEdgePoints = TRUE; //only if the map had the older edgepoint system
03100       }
03101       else
03102       {
03103             fGenerateEdgePoints = TRUE;
03104       }
03105       if( uiFlags & MAP_NPCSCHEDULES_SAVED )
03106       {
03107             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 91, 92, L"Loading NPC schedules..." );
03108             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03109             LoadSchedules( &pBuffer );
03110       }
03111 
03112       ValidateAndUpdateMapVersionIfNecessary();
03113 
03114       //if we arent loading a saved game
03115 //    if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
03116       {
03117             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 93, 94, L"Init Loaded World..." );
03118             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03119             InitLoadedWorld( );
03120       }
03121 
03122       if( fGenerateEdgePoints )
03123       {
03124             SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 94, 95, L"Generating map edgepoints..." );
03125             RenderProgressBar( 0, 0 );
03126             CompileWorldMovementCosts();
03127             GenerateMapEdgepoints();
03128       }
03129 
03130       RenderProgressBar( 0, 20 );
03131 
03132       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, 95, 100, L"General initialization..." );
03133       // RESET AI!
03134       InitOpponentKnowledgeSystem();
03135 
03136       RenderProgressBar( 0, 30 );
03137 
03138       //AllTeamsLookForAll(NO_INTERRUPTS);
03139 
03140       RenderProgressBar( 0, 40 );
03141 
03142       //Reset some override flags
03143       gfForceLoadPlayers = FALSE;
03144       gfForceLoad                    = FALSE;
03145 
03146       // CHECK IF OUR SELECTED GUY IS GONE!
03147       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
03148       {
03149             if ( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bActive == FALSE )
03150             {
03151                   gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;
03152             }
03153       }
03154 
03155       AdjustSoldierCreationStartValues( );
03156 
03157       RenderProgressBar( 0, 60 );
03158 
03159       InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
03160 
03161       // SAVE FILENAME
03162       strcpy( gzLastLoadedFile, puiFilename     );
03163       LoadRadarScreenBitmap( (CHAR8 *)puiFilename );
03164 
03165       RenderProgressBar( 0, 80 );
03166       
03167       gfWorldLoaded = TRUE;
03168 
03169       sprintf( (char *)gubFilename, (char *)puiFilename );
03170 
03171       //Remove this rather large chunk of memory from the system now!
03172       MemFree( pBufferHead );
03173 
03174 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03175       uiLoadWorldTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiLoadWorldStartTime;
03176 #endif
03177 
03178 //#ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03179 
03180   // ATE: Not while updating maps!
03181   if ( guiCurrentScreen != MAPUTILITY_SCREEN )
03182   {
03183       GenerateBuildings();
03184   }
03185 
03186 //#endif
03187 
03188       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
03189 
03190 
03191       DequeueAllKeyBoardEvents();
03192 
03193 
03194       return( TRUE );
03195 }
03196 
03197 
03198 //****************************************************************************************
03199 //
03200 //    Deletes everything then re-creates the world with simple ground tiles
03201 //
03202 //****************************************************************************************
03203 BOOLEAN NewWorld( void )
03204 {
03205       UINT16                        NewIndex;
03206       INT32                         cnt;
03207 
03208       gusSelectedSoldier = gusOldSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;
03209 
03210       AdjustSoldierCreationStartValues( );
03211 
03212       TrashWorld();
03213 
03214       // Create world randomly from tiles
03215       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
03216       {
03217             // Set land index
03218             NewIndex = (UINT16)(rand( ) % 10);
03219             AddLandToHead( cnt, NewIndex );
03220       }
03221 
03222 
03223       InitRoomDatabase( ); 
03224 
03225       gfWorldLoaded = TRUE;
03226 
03227       return( TRUE );
03228 }
03229 
03230 
03231 void TrashWorld( void )
03232 {
03233       MAP_ELEMENT       *pMapTile;
03234       LEVELNODE               *pLandNode;
03235       LEVELNODE               *pObjectNode;
03236       LEVELNODE               *pStructNode;
03237       LEVELNODE               *pShadowNode;
03238       LEVELNODE               *pMercNode;
03239       LEVELNODE               *pRoofNode;
03240       LEVELNODE               *pOnRoofNode;
03241       LEVELNODE               *pTopmostNode;
03242 //    STRUCTURE               *pStructureNode;
03243       INT32                         cnt;
03244       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
03245 
03246       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
03247             return;
03248       
03249 
03250       // REMOVE ALL ITEMS FROM WORLD
03251       TrashWorldItems(  );
03252 
03253       // Trash the overhead map
03254       TrashOverheadMap( );
03255 
03256       //Reset the smoke effects.  
03257       ResetSmokeEffects();
03258 
03259       //Reset the light effects
03260       ResetLightEffects();
03261 
03262       // Set soldiers to not active!
03263       //ATE: FOR NOW, ONLY TRASH FROM NPC UP!!!!
03264       //cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID + 1;
03265       cnt = 0;
03266 
03267       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
03268       {
03269             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
03270             {
03271                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03272                   {
03273                         // Just delete levelnode
03274                         pSoldier->pLevelNode = NULL;
03275                   }
03276                   else
03277                   {
03278                         // Delete from world
03279                         TacticalRemoveSoldier( (UINT16)cnt );
03280                   }
03281             }
03282       }
03283 
03284       RemoveCorpses( );
03285 
03286       // Remove all ani tiles...
03287       DeleteAniTiles( );
03288 
03289 
03290       //Kill both soldier init lists.
03291       UseEditorAlternateList();
03292       KillSoldierInitList();
03293       UseEditorOriginalList();
03294       KillSoldierInitList();
03295 
03296       //Remove the schedules
03297       DestroyAllSchedules();
03298 
03299       // on trash world sheck if we have to set up the first meanwhile
03300       HandleFirstMeanWhileSetUpWithTrashWorld( );
03301 
03302       // Create world randomly from tiles
03303       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
03304       {
03305             pMapTile = &gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ];
03306 
03307             // Free the memory associated with the map tile link lists
03308             pLandNode = pMapTile->pLandHead;
03309             while ( pLandNode != NULL )
03310             {
03311                   pMapTile->pLandHead = pLandNode->pNext;
03312                   MemFree( pLandNode );
03313                   pLandNode = pMapTile->pLandHead;
03314             }
03315 
03316             pObjectNode = pMapTile->pObjectHead;
03317             while ( pObjectNode != NULL )
03318             {
03319                   pMapTile->pObjectHead = pObjectNode->pNext;
03320                   MemFree( pObjectNode );
03321                   pObjectNode = pMapTile->pObjectHead;
03322             }
03323 
03324             pStructNode = pMapTile->pStructHead;
03325             while ( pStructNode != NULL )
03326             {
03327                   pMapTile->pStructHead = pStructNode->pNext;
03328                   MemFree( pStructNode );
03329                   pStructNode = pMapTile->pStructHead;
03330             }
03331 
03332             pShadowNode = pMapTile->pShadowHead;
03333             while ( pShadowNode != NULL )
03334             {
03335                   pMapTile->pShadowHead = pShadowNode->pNext;
03336                   MemFree( pShadowNode );
03337                   pShadowNode = pMapTile->pShadowHead;
03338             }
03339 
03340             pMercNode = pMapTile->pMercHead;
03341             while ( pMercNode != NULL )
03342             {
03343                   pMapTile->pMercHead = pMercNode->pNext;
03344                   MemFree( pMercNode );
03345                   pMercNode = pMapTile->pMercHead;
03346             }
03347 
03348             pRoofNode = pMapTile->pRoofHead;
03349             while ( pRoofNode != NULL )
03350             {
03351                   pMapTile->pRoofHead = pRoofNode->pNext;
03352                   MemFree( pRoofNode );
03353                   pRoofNode = pMapTile->pRoofHead;
03354             }
03355 
03356             pOnRoofNode = pMapTile->pOnRoofHead;
03357             while ( pOnRoofNode != NULL )
03358             {
03359                   pMapTile->pOnRoofHead = pOnRoofNode->pNext;
03360                   MemFree( pOnRoofNode );
03361                   pOnRoofNode = pMapTile->pOnRoofHead;
03362             }
03363 
03364             pTopmostNode = pMapTile->pTopmostHead;
03365             while ( pTopmostNode != NULL )
03366             {
03367                   pMapTile->pTopmostHead = pTopmostNode->pNext;
03368                   MemFree( pTopmostNode );
03369                   pTopmostNode = pMapTile->pTopmostHead;
03370             }
03371 
03372             while (pMapTile->pStructureHead != NULL)
03373             {
03374                   if (DeleteStructureFromWorld( pMapTile->pStructureHead ) == FALSE)
03375                   {
03376                         // ERROR!!!!!!
03377                         break;
03378                   }
03379             }
03380 
03381       }
03382 
03383       // Zero world
03384       memset( gpWorldLevelData, 0, WORLD_MAX * sizeof( MAP_ELEMENT ) );
03385 
03386       // Set some default flags
03387       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
03388       {
03389             gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RECALCULATE_WIREFRAMES;
03390       }
03391 
03392       TrashDoorTable();
03393       TrashMapEdgepoints();
03394       TrashDoorStatusArray();
03395 
03396       //gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
03397       gfWorldLoaded = FALSE;
03398       sprintf( (char *)gubFilename, "none" );
03399 }
03400 
03401 
03402 
03403 void TrashMapTile(INT16 MapTile)
03404 {
03405       MAP_ELEMENT       *pMapTile;
03406       LEVELNODE               *pLandNode;
03407       LEVELNODE               *pObjectNode;
03408       LEVELNODE               *pStructNode;
03409       LEVELNODE               *pShadowNode;
03410       LEVELNODE               *pMercNode;
03411       LEVELNODE               *pRoofNode;
03412       LEVELNODE               *pOnRoofNode;
03413       LEVELNODE               *pTopmostNode;
03414 
03415       pMapTile = &gpWorldLevelData[ MapTile ];
03416 
03417       // Free the memory associated with the map tile link lists
03418       pLandNode = pMapTile->pLandHead;
03419       while ( pLandNode != NULL )
03420       {
03421             pMapTile->pLandHead = pLandNode->pNext;
03422             MemFree( pLandNode );
03423             pLandNode = pMapTile->pLandHead;
03424       }
03425       pMapTile->pLandHead = pMapTile->pLandStart = NULL;
03426 
03427       pObjectNode = pMapTile->pObjectHead;
03428       while ( pObjectNode != NULL )
03429       {
03430             pMapTile->pObjectHead = pObjectNode->pNext;
03431             MemFree( pObjectNode );
03432             pObjectNode = pMapTile->pObjectHead;
03433       }
03434       pMapTile->pObjectHead = NULL;
03435 
03436       pStructNode = pMapTile->pStructHead;
03437       while ( pStructNode != NULL )
03438       {
03439             pMapTile->pStructHead = pStructNode->pNext;
03440             MemFree( pStructNode );
03441             pStructNode = pMapTile->pStructHead;
03442       }
03443       pMapTile->pStructHead = NULL;
03444 
03445       pShadowNode = pMapTile->pShadowHead;
03446       while ( pShadowNode != NULL )
03447       {
03448             pMapTile->pShadowHead = pShadowNode->pNext;
03449             MemFree( pShadowNode );
03450             pShadowNode = pMapTile->pShadowHead;
03451       }
03452       pMapTile->pShadowHead = NULL;
03453 
03454       pMercNode = pMapTile->pMercHead;
03455       while ( pMercNode != NULL )
03456       {
03457             pMapTile->pMercHead = pMercNode->pNext;
03458             MemFree( pMercNode );
03459             pMercNode = pMapTile->pMercHead;
03460       }
03461       pMapTile->pMercHead = NULL;
03462 
03463       pRoofNode = pMapTile->pRoofHead;
03464       while ( pRoofNode != NULL )
03465       {
03466             pMapTile->pRoofHead = pRoofNode->pNext;
03467             MemFree( pRoofNode );
03468             pRoofNode = pMapTile->pRoofHead;
03469       }
03470       pMapTile->pRoofHead = NULL;
03471 
03472       pOnRoofNode = pMapTile->pOnRoofHead;
03473       while ( pOnRoofNode != NULL )
03474       {
03475             pMapTile->pOnRoofHead = pOnRoofNode->pNext;
03476             MemFree( pOnRoofNode );
03477             pOnRoofNode = pMapTile->pOnRoofHead;
03478       }
03479       pMapTile->pOnRoofHead =  NULL;
03480 
03481       pTopmostNode = pMapTile->pTopmostHead;
03482       while ( pTopmostNode != NULL )
03483       {
03484             pMapTile->pTopmostHead = pTopmostNode->pNext;
03485             MemFree( pTopmostNode );
03486             pTopmostNode = pMapTile->pTopmostHead;
03487       }
03488       pMapTile->pTopmostHead =  NULL;
03489 
03490       while (pMapTile->pStructureHead != NULL)
03491       {
03492             DeleteStructureFromWorld( pMapTile->pStructureHead );
03493       }
03494       pMapTile->pStructureHead = pMapTile->pStructureTail = NULL;
03495 }
03496 
03497 
03498 
03499 BOOLEAN LoadMapTileset( INT32 iTilesetID )
03500 {
03501 
03502       if ( iTilesetID >= gubNumSets )
03503       {
03504             return( FALSE );
03505       }
03506 
03507       // Init tile surface used values
03508       memset( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded, 0, sizeof( gbNewTileSurfaceLoaded ) );
03509 
03510       if( iTilesetID == giCurrentTilesetID )
03511       {
03512             return( TRUE );
03513       }
03514 
03515       // Get free memory value nere
03516       gSurfaceMemUsage = guiMemTotal;
03517 
03518       // LOAD SURFACES
03519       CHECKF( LoadTileSurfaces( &(gTilesets[ iTilesetID ].TileSurfaceFilenames[0] ), (UINT8)iTilesetID ) != FALSE );
03520 
03521       // SET TERRAIN COSTS
03522       if ( gTilesets[ iTilesetID ].MovementCostFnc != NULL )
03523       {
03524             gTilesets[ iTilesetID ].MovementCostFnc( );
03525       }
03526       else
03527       {
03528             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Tileset %d has no callback function for movement costs. Using default.", iTilesetID) );
03529             SetTilesetOneTerrainValues( );
03530       }
03531 
03532       // RESET TILE DATABASE
03533       DeallocateTileDatabase( );
03534 
03535       CreateTileDatabase( );
03536 
03537       // SET GLOBAL ID FOR TILESET ( FOR SAVING! )
03538       giCurrentTilesetID = iTilesetID;
03539 
03540       return( TRUE );
03541 }
03542 
03543 
03544 BOOLEAN SaveMapTileset( INT32 iTilesetID )
03545 {
03546 //    FILE *hTSet;
03547       HWFILE hTSet;
03548       char zTilesetName[65];
03549       int   cnt;
03550       UINT32      uiBytesWritten;
03551 
03552       // Are we trying to save the default tileset?
03553       if ( iTilesetID == 0 )
03554             return( TRUE );
03555       
03556       sprintf( zTilesetName, "TSET%04d.SET", iTilesetID );
03557 
03558       // Open file
03559       hTSet = FileOpen( zTilesetName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
03560 
03561  
03562       if ( !hTSet )
03563       {
03564             return( FALSE );
03565       }
03566 
03567       // Save current tile set in map file.
03568       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBEROFTILETYPES; cnt++ )
03569             FileWrite( hTSet, TileSurfaceFilenames[cnt], 65, &uiBytesWritten );
03570       FileClose( hTSet );
03571 
03572       return( TRUE );
03573 }
03574 
03575 void SetLoadOverrideParams( BOOLEAN fForceLoad, BOOLEAN fForceFile, CHAR8 *zLoadName )
03576 {
03577       gfForceLoadPlayers = fForceLoad;
03578       gfForceLoad                    = fForceFile;
03579 
03580       if ( zLoadName != NULL )
03581       {
03582             strcpy( gzForceLoadFile, zLoadName );
03583       }
03584 }
03585 
03586 
03587 void AddWireFrame( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usIndex, BOOLEAN fForced )
03588 {
03589       LEVELNODE               *pTopmost, *pTopmostTail;
03590 
03591 
03592       pTopmost = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pTopmostHead;
03593 
03594       while ( pTopmost != NULL )
03595       {
03596             // Check if one of the samer type exists!
03597             if ( pTopmost->usIndex == usIndex )
03598             {
03599                   return;
03600             }
03601             pTopmost = pTopmost->pNext;
03602       }
03603 
03604       pTopmostTail = AddTopmostToTail( sGridNo, usIndex );
03605 
03606       if ( fForced )
03607       {
03608             pTopmostTail->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_WIREFRAME;
03609       }
03610 
03611 }
03612 
03613 
03614 UINT16 GetWireframeGraphicNumToUseForWall( INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE *pStructure )
03615 {
03616       LEVELNODE     *pNode = NULL;
03617       UINT8                         ubWallOrientation;
03618   UINT16        usValue = 0;
03619   UINT16        usSubIndex;
03620       STRUCTURE     *pBaseStructure;
03621 
03622       ubWallOrientation = pStructure->ubWallOrientation;
03623   
03624       pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
03625 
03626   if ( pBaseStructure )
03627   {
03628     // Find levelnode...
03629         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].pStructHead;
03630         while( pNode != NULL )
03631         {
03632               if (pNode->pStructureData == pBaseStructure)
03633               {
03634                     break;
03635               }
03636               pNode = pNode->pNext;
03637         }
03638     
03639     if ( pNode != NULL )
03640     {
03641       // Get Subindex for this wall...
03642       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( pNode->usIndex, &usSubIndex );
03643 
03644       // Check for broken peices...
03645       if ( usSubIndex == 48 || usSubIndex == 52 )
03646       {
03647         return( WIREFRAMES12 );   
03648       }
03649       else if ( usSubIndex == 49 || usSubIndex == 53 )
03650       {
03651         return( WIREFRAMES13 );   
03652       }
03653       else if ( usSubIndex == 50 || usSubIndex == 54 )
03654       {
03655         return( WIREFRAMES10 );   
03656       }
03657       else if ( usSubIndex == 51 || usSubIndex == 55 )
03658       {
03659         return( WIREFRAMES11 );   
03660       }
03661     }
03662   }
03663 
03664       switch( ubWallOrientation )
03665       {
03666             case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03667             case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03668 
03669       usValue = WIREFRAMES6;
03670                   break;
03671 
03672             case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03673             case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03674       usValue = WIREFRAMES5;
03675       break;
03676 
03677   }
03678 
03679   return( usValue );
03680 }
03681 
03682 void CalculateWorldWireFrameTiles( BOOLEAN fForce )
03683 {
03684       INT32                         cnt;
03685       STRUCTURE          *pStructure;
03686       INT16                         sGridNo;
03687       UINT8                         ubWallOrientation;
03688       INT8                          bHiddenVal;
03689       INT8                          bNumWallsSameGridNo;
03690   UINT16        usWireFrameIndex;
03691 
03692       // Create world randomly from tiles
03693       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
03694       {     
03695             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RECALCULATE_WIREFRAMES || fForce )
03696             {
03697       if ( cnt == 8377 )
03698       {
03699         int i = 0;
03700       }
03701 
03702                   // Turn off flag
03703                   gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RECALCULATE_WIREFRAMES );
03704 
03705                   // Remove old ones
03706                   RemoveWireFrameTiles( (INT16)cnt );
03707 
03708                   bNumWallsSameGridNo = 0;
03709 
03710                   // Check our gridno, if we have a roof over us that has not beenr evealed, no need for a wiereframe
03711                   if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( (UINT16)cnt ) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03712                   {
03713                         continue;
03714                   }
03715 
03716                   pStructure = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pStructureHead;
03717 
03718                   while ( pStructure != NULL )
03719                   {
03720                         // Check for doors
03721                         if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR )
03722                         {
03723                               // ATE: need this additional check here for hidden doors!
03724                               if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPENABLE )
03725                               {
03726                                     // Does the gridno we are over have a non-visible tile?
03727                                     // Based on orientation
03728                                     ubWallOrientation = pStructure->ubWallOrientation;
03729 
03730                                     switch( ubWallOrientation )
03731                                     {
03732                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03733                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03734 
03735                                                 // Get gridno 
03736                                                 sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
03737 
03738                                                 if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03739                                                 {
03740                                                       AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES4, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03741                                                 }
03742                                                 break;
03743 
03744                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03745                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03746 
03747                                                 // Get gridno 
03748                                                 sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
03749 
03750                                                 if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03751                                                 {
03752                                                       AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES3 , (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03753                                                 }
03754                                                 break;
03755 
03756                                     }
03757                               }
03758                         }
03759                         // Check for windows
03760                         else 
03761         {
03762           if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW )
03763                           {
03764                                 // Does the gridno we are over have a non-visible tile?
03765                                 // Based on orientation
03766                                 ubWallOrientation = pStructure->ubWallOrientation;
03767 
03768                                 switch( ubWallOrientation )
03769                                 {
03770                                       case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03771                                       case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03772 
03773                                             // Get gridno 
03774                                             sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
03775 
03776                                             if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03777                                             {
03778                                                   AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES2, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03779                                             }
03780                                             break;
03781 
03782                                       case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03783                                       case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03784 
03785                                             // Get gridno 
03786                                             sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
03787 
03788                                             if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03789                                             {
03790                                                   AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES1, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03791                                             }
03792                                             break;
03793 
03794                                 }
03795 
03796                           }
03797 
03798                           // Check for walls
03799                           if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF )
03800                           {
03801                                 // Does the gridno we are over have a non-visible tile?
03802                                 // Based on orientation
03803                                 ubWallOrientation = pStructure->ubWallOrientation;
03804 
03805             usWireFrameIndex = GetWireframeGraphicNumToUseForWall( (UINT16)cnt, pStructure );
03806 
03807                                 switch( ubWallOrientation )
03808                                 {
03809                                       case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03810                                       case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
03811 
03812                                             // Get gridno 
03813                                             sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
03814 
03815                                             if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) )
03816                                             {
03817                                                    bNumWallsSameGridNo++;
03818 
03819                                                    AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, usWireFrameIndex, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03820 
03821                                                    // Check along our direction to see if we are a corner
03822                                                    sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
03823                                                    sGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
03824                                                    bHiddenVal = IsHiddenTileMarkerThere( sGridNo );
03825                                                    // If we do not exist ( -1 ) or are revealed ( 1 )
03826                                                    if ( bHiddenVal == -1 || bHiddenVal == 1 )
03827                                                    {
03828                                                          // Place corner!
03829                                                          AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES9, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03830                                                    }
03831                                             }
03832                                             break;
03833 
03834                                       case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03835                                       case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
03836 
03837                                             // Get gridno 
03838                                             sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
03839 
03840                                             if ( IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( sGridNo ) )
03841                                             {
03842                                                    bNumWallsSameGridNo++;
03843 
03844                                                    AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, usWireFrameIndex, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03845 
03846                                                    // Check along our direction to see if we are a corner
