03847                                                    sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
03848                                                    sGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
03849                                                    bHiddenVal = IsHiddenTileMarkerThere( sGridNo );
03850                                                    // If we do not exist ( -1 ) or are revealed ( 1 )
03851                                                    if ( bHiddenVal == -1 || bHiddenVal == 1 )
03852                                                    {
03853                                                          // Place corner!
03854                                                          AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES8, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 ) );
03855                                                    }
03856 
03857                                             }
03858                                             break;
03859 
03860                                 }
03861 
03862                                 // Check for both walls
03863                                 if ( bNumWallsSameGridNo == 2 )
03864                                 {
03865                                        sGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)cnt, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
03866                                        sGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
03867                                        AddWireFrame( (INT16)cnt, WIREFRAMES7, (BOOLEAN)( ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) != 0 )  );
03868                                 }
03869           }
03870                         }
03871 
03872                         pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
03873                   }
03874             }
03875       }
03876 }
03877 
03878 
03879 void RemoveWorldWireFrameTiles( )
03880 {
03881       INT32                         cnt;
03882 
03883       // Create world randomly from tiles
03884       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
03885       {
03886             RemoveWireFrameTiles( (INT16)cnt );
03887       }
03888 
03889 }
03890 
03891 
03892 void RemoveWireFrameTiles( INT16 sGridNo )
03893 {
03894       LEVELNODE               *pTopmost, *pNewTopmost;
03895       TILE_ELEMENT *    pTileElement;
03896 
03897       pTopmost = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pTopmostHead;
03898 
03899       while ( pTopmost != NULL )
03900       {
03901             pNewTopmost = pTopmost->pNext;
03902 
03903             if ( pTopmost->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
03904             {
03905                   pTileElement = &(gTileDatabase[ pTopmost->usIndex ]);
03906 
03907                   if ( pTileElement->fType == WIREFRAMES )
03908                   {
03909                         RemoveTopmost( sGridNo, pTopmost->usIndex );                      
03910                   }
03911             }
03912             
03913             pTopmost = pNewTopmost;
03914       }
03915 
03916 }
03917 
03918 
03919  
03920 INT8 IsHiddenTileMarkerThere( INT16 sGridNo )
03921 {
03922       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
03923 
03924       if ( !gfBasement )
03925       {
03926             pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF );
03927 
03928             if ( pStructure != NULL )
03929             {
03930                   //if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03931                   {
03932                         return( 2 );
03933                   }           
03934 
03935                   // if we are here, a roof exists but has been revealed
03936                   return( 1 );
03937             }
03938       }
03939       else
03940       {
03941             //if ( InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoom ) )
03942             {
03943                   //if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
03944                   {
03945                         return( 2 );
03946                   }
03947 
03948                   return( 1 );
03949             }
03950       }
03951 
03952       return( -1 );
03953 }
03954 
03955 
03956 void ReloadTileset( UINT8 ubID )
03957 {
03958       CHAR8 aFilename[ 255 ];
03959       INT32 iCurrTilesetID = giCurrentTilesetID;
03960 
03961       // Set gloabal
03962       giCurrentTilesetID = ubID;
03963 
03964       // Save Map
03965       SaveWorld( (UINT8 *)TEMP_FILE_FOR_TILESET_CHANGE );
03966 
03967       //IMPORTANT:  If this is not set, the LoadTileset() will assume that
03968       //it is loading the same tileset and ignore it...
03969       giCurrentTilesetID = iCurrTilesetID;
03970 
03971       // Load Map with new tileset
03972       LoadWorld( (UINT8 *)TEMP_FILE_FOR_TILESET_CHANGE );
03973 
03974       // Delete file
03975       sprintf( aFilename, "MAPS\\%s", TEMP_FILE_FOR_TILESET_CHANGE );
03976 
03977       FileDelete( aFilename );
03978 
03979 }
03980 
03981 
03982 void SaveMapLights( HWFILE hfile )
03983 {
03984       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03985       SGPPaletteEntry   LColors[3];
03986       UINT8 ubNumColors;
03987       BOOLEAN fSoldierLight;
03988       UINT16 usNumLights = 0;
03989       UINT16 cnt, cnt2;
03990       UINT8 ubStrLen;
03991       UINT32      uiBytesWritten;
03992 
03993       ubNumColors = LightGetColors( LColors );
03994 
03995       // Save the current light colors!
03996       FileWrite( hfile, &ubNumColors, 1, &uiBytesWritten );
03997       FileWrite( hfile, LColors, sizeof(SGPPaletteEntry)*ubNumColors, &uiBytesWritten );
03998 
03999 
04000       //count number of non-merc lights.
04001       for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; cnt++ )
04002       {
04003             if( LightSprites[ cnt ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE )
04004             { //found an active light.  Check to make sure it doesn't belong to a merc.
04005                   fSoldierLight = FALSE;
04006                   for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS && !fSoldierLight; cnt2++ )
04007                   {
04008                         if( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, cnt2 ) )
04009                         {
04010                               if ( pSoldier->iLight == (INT32)cnt )
04011                                     fSoldierLight = TRUE;
04012                         }
04013                   }
04014                   if( !fSoldierLight )
04015                         usNumLights++;
04016             }
04017       }
04018 
04019       //save the number of lights.
04020       FileWrite( hfile, &usNumLights, 2, &uiBytesWritten );
04021 
04022 
04023       for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_LIGHT_SPRITES; cnt++ )
04024       {
04025             if( LightSprites[ cnt ].uiFlags & LIGHT_SPR_ACTIVE )
04026             { //found an active light.  Check to make sure it doesn't belong to a merc.
04027                   fSoldierLight = FALSE;
04028                   for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS && !fSoldierLight; cnt2++ )
04029                   {
04030                         if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, cnt2 ) )
04031                         {
04032                               if ( pSoldier->iLight == (INT32)cnt )
04033                                     fSoldierLight = TRUE;
04034                         }
04035                   }
04036                   if( !fSoldierLight )
04037                   { //save the light
04038                         FileWrite( hfile, &LightSprites[ cnt ], sizeof( LIGHT_SPRITE ), &uiBytesWritten );
04039 
04040                         ubStrLen = strlen( pLightNames[LightSprites[cnt].iTemplate] ) + 1 ;
04041                         FileWrite( hfile, &ubStrLen, 1, &uiBytesWritten );
04042                         FileWrite( hfile, pLightNames[LightSprites[cnt].iTemplate], ubStrLen, &uiBytesWritten );
04043 
04044                   }
04045             }
04046       }
04047 }     
04048 
04049 void LoadMapLights( INT8 **hBuffer )
04050 {
04051       SGPPaletteEntry   LColors[3];
04052       UINT8 ubNumColors;
04053       UINT16 usNumLights;
04054       INT32 cnt;
04055       INT8  str[30];
04056       UINT8 ubStrLen;
04057       LIGHT_SPRITE      TmpLight;
04058       INT32 iLSprite;
04059       UINT32 uiHour;
04060       BOOLEAN fPrimeTime = FALSE, fNightTime = FALSE;
04061 
04062       //reset the lighting system, so that any current lights are toasted.
04063       LightReset();
04064 
04065       // read in the light colors!
04066       LOADDATA( &ubNumColors, *hBuffer, 1 );
04067       LOADDATA( LColors, *hBuffer, sizeof(SGPPaletteEntry)*ubNumColors );
04068 
04069       LOADDATA( &usNumLights, *hBuffer, 2 );
04070 
04071       ubNumColors = 1;
04072 
04073       // ATE: OK, only regenrate if colors are different.....
04074       //if ( LColors[0].peRed != gpLightColors[0].peRed ||
04075       //           LColors[0].peGreen != gpLightColors[0].peGreen ||
04076       //           LColors[0].peBlue != gpLightColors[0].peBlue )
04077       {
04078             LightSetColors( LColors, ubNumColors );
04079       }
04080 
04081       //Determine which lights are valid for the current time.
04082       if( !gfEditMode )
04083       {
04084             uiHour = GetWorldHour();
04085             if( uiHour >= NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR || uiHour < NIGHT_TIME_LIGHT_END_HOUR )
04086             {
04087                   fNightTime = TRUE;
04088             }
04089             if( uiHour >= PRIME_TIME_LIGHT_START_HOUR )
04090             {
04091                   fPrimeTime = TRUE;
04092             }
04093       }
04094 
04095       for( cnt = 0; cnt < usNumLights; cnt++ )
04096       {
04097             LOADDATA( &TmpLight, *hBuffer, sizeof( LIGHT_SPRITE ) );
04098             LOADDATA( &ubStrLen, *hBuffer, 1 );
04099 
04100             if( ubStrLen )
04101             {
04102                   LOADDATA( str, *hBuffer, ubStrLen );
04103             }
04104             
04105             str[ ubStrLen ] = 0;
04106             
04107             iLSprite = LightSpriteCreate( (STR)str, TmpLight.uiLightType );
04108             //if this fails, then we will ignore the light.
04109             // ATE: Don't add ANY lights of mapscreen util is on
04110             if( iLSprite != -1 && guiCurrentScreen != MAPUTILITY_SCREEN )
04111             {
04112                   if( !gfCaves || gfEditMode )
04113                   {
04114                         if( gfEditMode || 
04115                                     TmpLight.uiFlags & LIGHT_PRIMETIME && fPrimeTime ||
04116                                 TmpLight.uiFlags & LIGHT_NIGHTTIME && fNightTime ||
04117                                     !(TmpLight.uiFlags & (LIGHT_PRIMETIME | LIGHT_NIGHTTIME)) )
04118                         { //power only valid lights.
04119                               LightSpritePower( iLSprite, TRUE );
04120                         }
04121                   }
04122                   LightSpritePosition( iLSprite, TmpLight.iX, TmpLight.iY );
04123                   if( TmpLight.uiFlags & LIGHT_PRIMETIME )
04124                         LightSprites[ iLSprite ].uiFlags |= LIGHT_PRIMETIME;
04125                   else if( TmpLight.uiFlags & LIGHT_NIGHTTIME )
04126                         LightSprites[ iLSprite ].uiFlags |= LIGHT_NIGHTTIME;
04127             }
04128       }
04129 }
04130 
04131 
04132 BOOLEAN IsRoofVisibleForWireframe( INT16 sMapPos )
04133 {
04134       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
04135 
04136       if ( !gfBasement )
04137       {
04138             pStructure = FindStructure( sMapPos, STRUCTURE_ROOF );
04139 
04140             if ( pStructure != NULL )
04141             {
04142                   return( TRUE );
04143             }
04144       }
04145       else
04146       {
04147             //if ( InARoom( sMapPos, &ubRoom ) )
04148             {
04149                   //if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sMapPos ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
04150                   {
04151                         return( TRUE );
04152                   }
04153             }
04154       }
04155 
04156       return( FALSE );
04157 }
